original: gzugs brnyan dag pa la sogs pa ral gri'i mthar thug pa ni las bcu gnyis rnams sngar dang phyi ma'i las bshad pas so //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan dag pa la sogs pa ral gri'i mthar thug pa ni las bcu gnyis rnams sngar dang phyi ma'i las bshad pas so //
translated: The pure reflection, etc., up to the sword, are the twelve activities, explained as the former and latter activities.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsal bar byed do //
translated: It is clear that all activities are accomplished by the practice of the Buddha Skull, whether one is abiding in the stage of generation or abiding in the stage of completion.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsod pa dang ro dag la nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis gnyis ka la nye bar len pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsod pa dang ro dag la nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis gnyis ka la nye bar len pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the appropriator of both, since it is the appropriator of the killer and the corpse.

original: mi snang ba zhes pa bdag nyid do //
analyzed: mi snang ba zhes pa bdag nyid do //
translated: The word invisible refers to the self.

original: mchog min zhes pa phul byung ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mchog min zhes pa phul byung ma yin pa'o //
translated: The word inferior refers to the non-excellent.

original: dka' thub nges pa drag rnams kyis //
analyzed: dka' thub nges pa drag rnams kyis //
translated: The word ascetic refers to the one who is engaged in severe austerities.üîΩ The word body refers to the body of the ascetic.üîΩ The word dried up refers to the body that is emaciated by austerities.

original: lus ni skems shing sdug bsngal nyid //
analyzed: lus ni skems shing sdug bsngal nyid //
translated: The word suffering refers to the suffering of the body.

original: sdug bsngal ba las sems g-yengs te //üîΩg-yeng ba las dngos grub gzhan du'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba las sems g-yengs te // g-yeng ba las dngos grub gzhan du'o //
translated: The word distraction refers to the distraction of the mind due to suffering.

original: zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa /
translated: The word elsewhere refers to the attainment of the goal elsewhere due to distraction.

original: 'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin pas //üîΩzhes @172a * //
analyzed: 'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin pas // zhes @172a * //
translated: The word enjoying refers to the enjoyment of the five sense objects.

original: so ; ; sgyu ma rnams ni thams cad la //
analyzed: so ; ; sgyu ma rnams ni thams cad la //
translated: The word all refers to all the illusions.

original: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //üîΩye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
analyzed: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags // ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
translated: The word superior refers to the illusion of a woman.üîΩ The word this refers to the illusion of a woman.

original: 'di kho na la gsal bar mtshon //
analyzed: 'di kho na la gsal bar mtshon //
translated: The word clearly refers to the clear manifestation of the three wisdoms.

original: zhes pa'i rigs pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la nye bar spyod pa na gtso bo bud med bsten pa ste thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa'i rigs pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la nye bar spyod pa na gtso bo bud med bsten pa ste thabs la mkhas pa nyid kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: By this reasoning, when one enjoys the five sense objects, one relies on a woman, the chief of them, and by being skilled in the means, it is the cause of the Great Seal's attainment.

original: de nas de'i don du ro tsa bar byed pa mdor bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas de'i don du ro tsa bar byed pa mdor bstan pa'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: Then, in order to explain the meaning of that, he speaks in brief of the making of the elixir:

original: 'jigs pa 'joms byed ces pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'jigs pa 'joms byed ces pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: The destroyer of fear, etc.

original: 'jigs pa rnam par rtog pa rnams lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba'i dus su nub par 'gro ba'i phyir 'joms par rung ba'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa rnam par rtog pa rnams lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba'i dus su nub par 'gro ba'i phyir 'joms par rung ba'o //
translated: Fear is the conceptualization that arises simultaneously with the innate, and it is suitable to be destroyed because it goes to sleep at the time of arising.

original: g-yul chen po ni dga' rtsed sna tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yul chen po ni dga' rtsed sna tshogs pa'o //
translated: The great battle is the various kinds of play.

original: byed bzhin pa ni skyes pa gcig gis bud med 'bum las rgyal bar byed de ro tsa ba'i byed pas so //
analyzed: byed bzhin pa ni skyes pa gcig gis bud med 'bum las rgyal bar byed de ro tsa ba'i byed pas so //
translated: The one who is doing it is the one man who conquers a hundred thousand women, by the action of the elixir.

original: ci 'di ltar mthong ngam zhe na gsungs pa skyes pa gcig gis zhes te /
analyzed: ci 'di ltar mthong ngam zhe na gsungs pa skyes pa gcig gis zhes te /
translated: If one asks, Is it seen like this? he says, the one man, etc.

original: skyes pa gcig 'dod pa chen po can du mthong ste 'phags pa chos 'phags la sogs pas bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad rnams te /
analyzed: skyes pa gcig 'dod pa chen po can du mthong ste 'phags pa chos 'phags la sogs pas bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad rnams te /
translated: One man is seen to have great desire, and the noble Subh≈´ti and so forth have sixty-eight thousand women.

original: nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir bud med 'bum phrag zil gyis gnon zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir bud med 'bum phrag zil gyis gnon zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: And because of the illustration, one hundred thousand women are overwhelmed, the remainder.

original: de'i phyir 'dod pa spyod de /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dod pa spyod de /
translated: Therefore, he practices desire.

original: gcig gis zhes pa gcig pus thams cad ces thams cad ma rnams la'o //
analyzed: gcig gis zhes pa gcig pus thams cad ces thams cad ma rnams la'o //
translated: With one, with just one, with all, with all the women.

original: 'dir yang thabs ni ro tsa bar byed pa zhes pa byang chub kyi sems 'ju bar byed pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'phel ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang thabs ni ro tsa bar byed pa zhes pa byang chub kyi sems 'ju bar byed pa dang 'dzin pa dang / 'phel ba ste /
translated: Here also, the method is the melting bliss, the melting and holding and increasing of the bodhicitta.

original: gsum po 'di ji ltar 'gyur ba de 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsum po 'di ji ltar 'gyur ba de 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: How these three occur will be explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas mkha' lding sbyor ba mdor ston te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas mkha' lding sbyor ba mdor ston te /
translated: Then, etc.

original: ming ji bzhin zhes pa ji ltar rab tu grags par 'gyur ba de ltar bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ming ji bzhin zhes pa ji ltar rab tu grags par 'gyur ba de ltar bshad par bya'o //
translated: As for just the name, just as it is well known, so it should be explained.

original: sh'a li k'a'i byed pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i byed pa ni rab tu rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sh'a li k'a'i byed pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i byed pa ni rab tu rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: The activities of the ≈õƒÅlika and the knowledge-holder will be taught extensively.

original: rgyan po ni cho lo ste /
analyzed: rgyan po ni cho lo ste /
translated: Gambling is dice.

original: de rtse bas dug gzhig par byed do //
analyzed: de rtse bas dug gzhig par byed do //
translated: By playing that, one destroys poison.

original: rnga brdung ba'o //
analyzed: rnga brdung ba'o //
translated: It is beating a drum.

original: zin pa bud med kyis 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: zin pa bud med kyis 'phrog pa'o //
translated: The seized is taken away by a woman.

original: ka ra b'i ra'i shing gis mgo bo nas bzung nas rkang pa'i mthil ji srid par bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: ka ra b'i ra'i shing gis mgo bo nas bzung nas rkang pa'i mthil ji srid par bsnun pa'o //
translated: The karavƒ´ra tree is struck from the head to the soles of the feet.

original: zhags pa zhes pa zhags pa'i rnam pa'i thag pas mgrin par bcings nas 'gugs pa'o //
analyzed: zhags pa zhes pa zhags pa'i rnam pa'i thag pas mgrin par bcings nas 'gugs pa'o //
translated: The noose is a rope in the form of a noose that is bound around the neck and pulled.

original: khu byug gi sgra byed pa'o //
analyzed: khu byug gi sgra byed pa'o //
translated: The sound of the cuckoo is made.

original: padma 'byed pa zhes pa nang gi padma rnams @172b su rtsa ba'i 'don pa'i bsam pas man ngag ji lta bar rlung 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: padma 'byed pa zhes pa nang gi padma rnams @172b su rtsa ba'i 'don pa'i bsam pas man ngag ji lta bar rlung 'gog pa'o //
translated: The opening of the lotus is the blocking of the vƒÅyu according to the intimate instruction of the root mantra to the extent of the soles of the feet from the head with the intention of the inner lotus.

original: gzhan ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i rtse gnyis 'khrul 'khor du byed par smra'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i rtse gnyis 'khrul 'khor du byed par smra'o //
translated: Others say that the two tips of the enjoyment cakra are made into a yantra.

original: stag byed ni stag bzhin du bgrod pa'i tshul gyis 'chag pa'o //
analyzed: stag byed ni stag bzhin du bgrod pa'i tshul gyis 'chag pa'o //
translated: The tiger is walking in the manner of a tiger.

original: chu ni rab tu rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu ni rab tu rgyas par ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: Water is shown to be abundant.

original: dung zhes pa ni dung gi sgra'o //
analyzed: dung zhes pa ni dung gi sgra'o //
translated: Conch is the sound of a conch.

original: thod lo kor 'phrog ces pa ni thod lo kor gyis bzung ba'i ming bris pa las dug 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: thod lo kor 'phrog ces pa ni thod lo kor gyis bzung ba'i ming bris pa las dug 'phrog pa'o //
translated: Skull-cap snatcher is the name of a poison-snatcher written on a skull-cap.

original: skyug pa zhes pa skyug par byed pa'o //üîΩras kyi gos kyis g-yogs pa'o //
analyzed: skyug pa zhes pa skyug par byed pa'o // ras kyi gos kyis g-yogs pa'o //
translated: Vomit is the vomiting.üîΩ Covered with cloth is covered with cloth.

original: thal lcag ces pa thal lcag gis bsnun pa'o //
analyzed: thal lcag ces pa thal lcag gis bsnun pa'o //
translated: Palm-strike is a palm-strike.

original: yig gsum zhes pa dha ka ka ra yis brdeg pa'o //
analyzed: yig gsum zhes pa dha ka ka ra yis brdeg pa'o //
translated: Three letters is a blow with a dhakka-kara.

original: ha ho hr'i: zhes pa'i yi ge gsum gyis dug 'jig pa'o zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: ha ho hr'i: zhes pa'i yi ge gsum gyis dug 'jig pa'o zhes kha cig go //
translated: The three letters ha ho hrih destroy poison, say some.

original: bsam gtan lta bas gtam zhes pa dkar po'i aa yig la sogs pa bsgom pa'i lta bas gtam bya ba'o zhes pa sbyor ba bco brgyad po 'di rnams kyis dug dgug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan lta bas gtam zhes pa dkar po'i aa yig la sogs pa bsgom pa'i lta bas gtam bya ba'o zhes pa sbyor ba bco brgyad po 'di rnams kyis dug dgug par 'gyur ro //
translated: The eighteen applications are: The talk of the view of meditation is the talk of the view of the meditation of the white a-stroke, etc. By these eighteen applications, the poison is summoned.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa rgyas par ston te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa mdor bstan pa rgyas par ston te /
translated: The completion stage is taught in detail, having been taught in brief.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: rol pa bde ba can padmar yod pa ni bzang po ste /
analyzed: rol pa bde ba can padmar yod pa ni bzang po ste /
translated: The good play in the lotus of bliss is the good.

original: ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i dga' ba'o //
translated: Wisdom is the joy of connate joy.

original: ji bzhin pa ni gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid kyis rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis na de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: ji bzhin pa ni gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nyid kyis rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis na de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: Just so is the relative truth, because it is devoid of intrinsic nature by virtue of being free from the nature of one and many.

original: bha ga ni padma ste de'i dbus kyi gzhi la rnam par bzhugs te /
analyzed: bha ga ni padma ste de'i dbus kyi gzhi la rnam par bzhugs te /
translated: The bhaga is the lotus, and he abides in the center of that.

original: rnam par rtog pa rnams bsal nas bzhugs te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa rnams bsal nas bzhugs te /
translated: He abides having dispelled all conceptual thoughts.

original: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa nyid kyis so //
translated: He does not abide in cyclic existence or in nirvana.

original: de kye'i rdo rjer gsungs pa /
analyzed: de kye'i rdo rjer gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated in the Hevajra Tantra:

original: rdo rje rtse mo'i bha ga bzang //
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo'i bha ga bzang //
translated: The bhaga of the vajra peak is excellent,

original: bde ba can dung bzhugs te //
analyzed: bde ba can dung bzhugs te //
translated: and he abides in the conch of Sukhavati.üîΩThe Buddha is the jeweled casket,

original: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ae yig cha byad ngo bor ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / ae yig cha byad ngo bor ro //
translated: and the form of the letter e.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: btsun mo'i bha ga bde chen du //
analyzed: btsun mo'i bha ga bde chen du //
translated: in the bhaga of the queen,

original: khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas //üîΩde med par ni bde mi 'gyur //
analyzed: khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas // de med par ni bde mi 'gyur //
translated: he abides by the name of semen.üîΩWithout that, there is no bliss,

original: bde ba bor nas de mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba bor nas de mi 'gyur //
translated: and without bliss, he does not exist.

original: zhes so // de bzhin du ;
analyzed: zhes so // de bzhin du ;
translated: And also:üîΩIn the bhaga of the queen,üîΩhe abides by the name of semen.üîΩWithout that, there is no bliss,üîΩand without bliss, he does not exist.

original: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga //
translated: I am the nature of innate bliss.

original: mchog mtha' khyad dga' dang po can //
analyzed: mchog mtha' khyad dga' dang po can //
translated: The supreme end is the first of special joys.

original: zhes so // 'dir khu ba'i ming gis zhes pa byang chub sems kyi rnam pa kho na'i sems de ltar gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir khu ba'i ming gis zhes pa byang chub sems kyi rnam pa kho na'i sems de ltar gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the word ‚Äúsemen‚Äù is used because the form of the bodhicitta is clearly the mind.

original: mchog mtha' khyad dga' dang po can //üîΩzhes mchog @173a * //
analyzed: mchog mtha' khyad dga' dang po can // zhes mchog @173a * //
translated: The supreme end is the first of special joys.

original: gi mtha' khyad par dga' ba ni gang gi dang po yin pa ste /
analyzed: gi mtha' khyad par dga' ba ni gang gi dang po yin pa ste /
translated: The supreme end is the special joy, which is the first of the special joys.

original: mchog gi de ma thag tu khyad par dga' ba dang / de'i de ma thag tu lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mchog gi de ma thag tu khyad par dga' ba dang / de'i de ma thag tu lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Immediately after the supreme, there is the special joy, and immediately after that, the innate. This is the meaning.

original: lugs gzhan la ni khyad par dga' ba'i dang po ste /
analyzed: lugs gzhan la ni khyad par dga' ba'i dang po ste /
translated: In another system, the special joy is the first of the supreme,

original: mchog dang khyad par dga' ba dag gi dbus su'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mchog dang khyad par dga' ba dag gi dbus su'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: in the middle of the supreme and the special joy. This is the meaning.

original: 'dod pa 'di yang mi 'thad de //
analyzed: 'dod pa 'di yang mi 'thad de //
translated: This assertion is not correct.

original: khyad dga' dang por mtshon par bya //
analyzed: khyad dga' dang por mtshon par bya //
translated: The special joy should be indicated as the first.

original: de yang dga' ba gsum po spangs //
analyzed: de yang dga' ba gsum po spangs //
translated: It is also free from the three joys.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is stated.

original: 'dis ni khyad dga' yang 'di yin la dang por yang ngo zhes pas khyad dga'i dus kho nar nye bar 'chad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa dang po kho nar mtshon par bya'o zhes rtogs par byas te lhan cig skyes pa shar na ni rnam par rtog pa thams
analyzed: 'dis ni khyad dga' yang 'di yin la dang por yang ngo zhes pas khyad dga'i dus kho nar nye bar 'chad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa dang po kho nar mtshon par bya'o zhes rtogs par byas te lhan cig skyes pa shar na ni rnam par rtog pa thams
translated: This means that the first is also this special joy, so one should understand that the connate [joy] that is taught as being special is only indicated as the first.

original: cad nub pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ga la mtshon //
analyzed: cad nub pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ga la mtshon //
translated: When the connate [joy] arises, since it is the nature of the subsiding of all conceptuality, how could it be indicated?

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
translated: For that very reason, the noble NƒÅgƒÅrjuna said:

original: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba 'di //
translated: This division of the three exalted wisdoms

original: 'di kho na la gsal bar mtshon //
analyzed: 'di kho na la gsal bar mtshon //
translated: is clearly indicated in this [fourth].

original: zhes pa 'dis dga' ba gsum po mtshon pa dang bzhi pa mi mtshon par gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis dga' ba gsum po mtshon pa dang bzhi pa mi mtshon par gsungs so //
translated: This says that the three joys are indicated and the fourth is not indicated.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn also said:

original: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan //
translated: Other than the three that are free from characteristics.

original: zhes pa 'dis so //
analyzed: zhes pa 'dis so //
translated: This is what he said.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i rjes thogs su khyad dga' skye ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i rjes thogs su khyad dga' skye ste /
translated: Therefore, how could the special joy arise after the connate [joy],

original: mtshon par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshon par mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: since it cannot be indicated?

original: khyad dga'i de ma thag pa'i dran pa kho nas mtshon pa nyid kyis na nyams su myong ba'i chos ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad dga'i de ma thag pa'i dran pa kho nas mtshon pa nyid kyis na nyams su myong ba'i chos ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is only the immediately preceding mindfulness of the special delight that indicates it, and so the experienced reality is not taught.

original: lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba'i gnas la ni log par rtogs pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba'i gnas la ni log par rtogs pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: In the state of the arising of the connate, there is no misconception at all.

original: 'o na dang por yang ci'i phyir mtshon te /
analyzed: 'o na dang por yang ci'i phyir mtshon te /
translated: Well, why is it indicated in the beginning?

original: nyams su ma myong ba nyid kho na'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: nyams su ma myong ba nyid kho na'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is not experienced at all.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so,

original: tho rangs kyi dus mtshams bzhin no //
analyzed: tho rangs kyi dus mtshams bzhin no //
translated: like the time of dawn.

original: 'o na de lta na yang de'i ngo bo nyer bar mtshon pa kho na'o zhe na bden te /
analyzed: 'o na de lta na yang de'i ngo bo nyer bar mtshon pa kho na'o zhe na bden te /
translated: Well, in that case, its nature is indicated.

original: nyams su myong ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar nye bar bsten par bya'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar nye bar bsten par bya'o //
translated: It is true, but the method of experience should be relied upon in this way.

original: 'o na de lta bu ni thabs su yang 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'o na de lta bu ni thabs su yang 'gyur bar 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: Well, in that case, it is not suitable to be a method,

original: de nas bzung nas de nye bar mtshon par mngon par zhen pa 'di la de mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: de nas bzung nas de nye bar mtshon par mngon par zhen pa 'di la de mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because from that time on, it is not possible for this conception to indicate it.

original: bden te / gal te de ltar gyur na'o //
analyzed: bden te / gal te de ltar gyur na'o //
translated: It is true, but if it were like that,

original: der ni de ltar 'byung bzhin pa ni ji ltar bya ba de ltar bla ma rnams gsungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der ni de ltar 'byung bzhin pa ni ji ltar bya ba de ltar bla ma rnams gsungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, the gurus have said, it is as it occurs.

original: de ltar 'dod pa gnyis ka la yang nye bar mtshon pa'i rim pa gsal bar byas so //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod pa gnyis ka la yang nye bar mtshon pa'i rim pa gsal bar byas so //
translated: In that way, both of the two assertions have been clarified by the process of illustration.

original: @173b khyad dga' lhan cig skyes pa'i de ma thag pa nyid na rgyud gzhan rnams dang / bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'dzin pa phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyang mi 'thad cing /
analyzed: @173b khyad dga' lhan cig skyes pa'i de ma thag pa nyid na rgyud gzhan rnams dang / bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'dzin pa phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyang mi 'thad cing /
translated: In the very moment of the innate joy, it is not tenable that there is the power of the seal, which is the power of the other continua, nor is it tenable that there is the power of the bindu of the half-half sixteen.

original: lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong ba'i thabs kyang mi srid kyi /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa nyams su myong ba'i thabs kyang mi srid kyi /
translated: Also, the method of experiencing the innate is not possible.üîΩOnly the very essence of the innate alone is not untenable.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na 'ba' zhig pa ni mi 'thad pa med do zhes pas lugs snga ma kho na man ngag rig pa rnams gsung ngo zhes pa shin tu zhar la byung bas chog go //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na 'ba' zhig pa ni mi 'thad pa med do zhes pas lugs snga ma kho na man ngag rig pa rnams gsung ngo zhes pa shin tu zhar la byung bas chog go //
translated: Thus, those who know the esoteric instructions say that only the former system is correct.

original: ye shes bzang po de dpe nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrub par byed par blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ;
analyzed: ye shes bzang po de dpe nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba bsgrub par bya ba'i sgrub par byed par blta bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ;
translated: The good wisdom should be seen as the means of accomplishing the mundane co-emergent bliss by means of the example itself.

original: bde ba chen po ster byed pa //
analyzed: bde ba chen po ster byed pa //
translated: The means of bestowing great bliss

original: zhes pa de'i thabs su gyur ba'i lhan cig skyes pa man ngag ji lta ba bzhin goms par byas pas ni mi 'gyur ba bde ba chen po sgrib pa phul du dbyung du med pa thabs las byung ba nye bar bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa de'i thabs su gyur ba'i lhan cig skyes pa man ngag ji lta ba bzhin goms par byas pas ni mi 'gyur ba bde ba chen po sgrib pa phul du dbyung du med pa thabs las byung ba nye bar bskyed par bya'o //
translated: By means of the co-emergent which is the means of that, the great bliss which is unchanging, which is not to be removed, which arises from the means, should be generated by means of practice in accordance with the esoteric instructions.

original: thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i bde ba 'di dag gi de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i bde ba 'di dag gi de kho na nyid ni rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid kho na'o //
translated: The reality of these means and the bliss which arises from the means is just emptiness, which has the characteristic of being essenceless.

original: gang rnams bde ba kho na de kho na nyid du yid ches nas gnas pa de rnams kyi 'khrul pa bsal ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang rnams bde ba kho na de kho na nyid du yid ches nas gnas pa de rnams kyi 'khrul pa bsal ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
translated: For the sake of dispelling the error of those who abide in the conviction that just that bliss is reality, the Transcendent Victor said:

original: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba //
analyzed: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba //
translated: Because the great elements are blissful.

original: de phyir bde ba de nyid min //
analyzed: de phyir bde ba de nyid min //
translated: Therefore, that pleasure is not reality.

original: zhes so // lhan cig skyes pa yang thams cad kyi tshe thams cad du mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: zhes so // lhan cig skyes pa yang thams cad kyi tshe thams cad du mi 'byung ste /
translated: The innate also does not occur at all times and in all situations.

original: de ltar na lhan cig skyes pa dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de ltar na lhan cig skyes pa dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo ste /
translated: Thus, the innate is the intrinsic reality of things.

original: de'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kho na dang kun rdzob pa rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kho na dang kun rdzob pa rtogs pa'o //
translated: Its ultimate reality is emptiness alone, and its superficial reality is understanding.

original: bde ba na rtogs pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: bde ba na rtogs pa yin mod kyi /
translated: When there is pleasure, there is understanding.

original: de lta na yang thams cad kyi tshe thams cad du lhan cig skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang thams cad kyi tshe thams cad du lhan cig skyes pa yin te /
translated: But even so, it is not innate at all times and in all situations,

original: sdug bsngal dang btang snyoms su myong ba'i dus su dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su rtogs pa bzhin du nyams su ma myong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang btang snyoms su myong ba'i dus su dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa la dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su rtogs pa bzhin du nyams su ma myong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is not experienced at the time of experiencing pain and indifference, nor in the fourth meditation, nor in the formless realm, just as understanding is not.

original: gang mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa /
translated: It is said in the Discourse Expressive of Reality:

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang //
translated: The fourth meditation is the peak of existence.

original: zhes pa der bsam gtan bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rtse mor te rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rab tu gyur pa mthar thug pa la de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas pa de'i phyir de'i rang gi ngo bo 'dzin @174a *üîΩ// pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa der bsam gtan bzhi pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rtse mor te rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rab tu gyur pa mthar thug pa la de'i bdag nyid kyis gnas pa de'i phyir de'i rang gi ngo bo 'dzin @174a * // pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Because one abides in the nature of that, it is said to be ‚Äúthe nature of holding that.‚ÄùüîΩWhen the limitless three realms appear in the nature of great bliss, the concentrations and so on are also the nature of great bliss, only the BhagavƒÅn, not others.

original: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du mu mtha' med pa'i khams gsum pa snang bar gyur pa na bsam gtan la sogs pa yang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni bcom ldan 'das kho na ste gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes pa bzlas te bshad pa'i don
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du mu mtha' med pa'i khams gsum pa snang bar gyur pa na bsam gtan la sogs pa yang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni bcom ldan 'das kho na ste gzhan gyi ni ma yin no zhes pa bzlas te bshad pa'i don
translated: The meaning of the explanation is repeated.

original: to // 'o na ji ltar bde ba lhan cig skyes par brjod ce na /
analyzed: to // 'o na ji ltar bde ba lhan cig skyes par brjod ce na /
translated: Well then, how is it said to be innate bliss?

original: ji ltar dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po de kho na nyid ma mthong ba'i yod pa ma yin pa lhag par mos pas bsgom bzhin pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa na rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes par brjod pa de
analyzed: ji ltar dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po de kho na nyid ma mthong ba'i yod pa ma yin pa lhag par mos pas bsgom bzhin pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa na rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi phyir kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes par brjod pa de
translated: When one meditates on great compassion that is focused on suchness, one does so with a conviction that is not based on seeing suchness. When one realizes suchness, one realizes the nature of great compassion.

original: bzhin du bde ba res 'ga' nyams su myong ba'i gnas skabs su dang / nyams su ma myong ba'i gnas skabs su de kho na nyid ma mthong bas lhag par mos pas snying rje chen po dang dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas /
analyzed: bzhin du bde ba res 'ga' nyams su myong ba'i gnas skabs su dang / nyams su ma myong ba'i gnas skabs su de kho na nyid ma mthong bas lhag par mos pas snying rje chen po dang dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pas /
translated: In the same way, when one meditates on emptiness, which is the nature of great compassion, in a way that is inseparable from great compassion, one does so with a conviction that is not based on seeing suchness. When one realizes suchness, one realizes the nature of emptiness.

original: sgom pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes par brjod do //
analyzed: sgom pa ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes par brjod do //
translated: The meditation on emptiness that is endowed with the most sublime of manifestations is called the transcendent, or ultimate, connateness of the relative.üîΩThe meditation on emptiness that is endowed with the most sublime of manifestations is called the transcendent, or ultimate, connateness of the relative.

original: de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su nyams su myong ba ni 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid ma rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su nyams su myong ba ni 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob pa'i lhan cig skyes pa ste /
translated: The experience of the connate that is not the realization of suchness is the connate of the worldly relative.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i grib ma'i rjes su byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is so called because it is the trace of the connate.

original: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: lhan skyes dag las gang skyes pa //üîΩde ni lhan cig skyes par bshad //
analyzed: lhan skyes dag las gang skyes pa // de ni lhan cig skyes par bshad //
translated: What is born from the connateüîΩis explained as the connate.

original: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par bshad //
analyzed: rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par bshad //
translated: The connate is explained as the nature.üîΩAll aspects are the same in the vows;

original: rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig / snying rje thams cad rnal 'byor 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig / snying rje thams cad rnal 'byor 'gyur //
translated: all compassion is yoga.

original: phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las ;
analyzed: phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las ;
translated: The seal is free from causes.

original: ; stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
analyzed: ; stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
translated: Emptiness and compassion are inseparable.

original: byang chub sems zhes bshad pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems zhes bshad pa'o //
translated: That is explained as bodhicitta.

original: zhes so // 'dir 'di la sdom par bya ba'o zhes pa sdom pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'dir 'di la sdom par bya ba'o zhes pa sdom pa'o //
translated: Here, samvara means ‚Äúthat which is to be bound.‚Äù

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi ste sngon po dang ser po la sogs kyi gcig ste gnyis pa med pa'i sdom pa ste lhan cig skyes pa kho na de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi ste sngon po dang ser po la sogs kyi gcig ste gnyis pa med pa'i sdom pa ste lhan cig skyes pa kho na de ltar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The ‚Äúbond‚Äù is the single, non-dual aspect of blue, yellow, etc. , because it appears in that way.

original: lhan cig skyes pa dag yang gang dag las skyes pa lhan cig skyes par brjod par bya ba de dag ni snying rje dang phyag rgya dag go //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa dag yang gang dag las skyes pa lhan cig skyes par brjod par bya ba de dag ni snying rje dang phyag rgya dag go //
translated: And what are those that are born together, from which it is to be said that they are born together? They are compassion and the seal.

original: de'i phyir snying rje dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin de gang gi thabs yin pa 'di ltar gyur pa de ni rnal @174b 'byar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir snying rje dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin de gang gi thabs yin pa 'di ltar gyur pa de ni rnal @174b 'byar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, that which is the method of that great compassion, the nature of which is non-apprehending compassion, is the yogi.

original: 'di skad bshad de /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad de /
translated: This is what is being said:

original: thabs kyi de kho na nyid bde ba 'di yin gyi /
analyzed: thabs kyi de kho na nyid bde ba 'di yin gyi /
translated: This is the reality of the method, bliss,

original: shes rab kyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the reality of wisdom.

original: phyag rgya ni stong pa nyid dang de kho na chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can shes rab dam pa ste rgyu dang bral ba las ni rgyu med pa las te /
analyzed: phyag rgya ni stong pa nyid dang de kho na chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid can shes rab dam pa ste rgyu dang bral ba las ni rgyu med pa las te /
translated: The seal is the highest wisdom, emptiness, the reality of all phenomena, the characteristic of non-arising. From the absence of cause, from the absence of cause,

original: chos rnams thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because all phenomena are primordially unborn.

original: rang bzhin 'di dag kyang lhan cig skyes pa dag kho na ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin 'di dag kyang lhan cig skyes pa dag kho na ste /
translated: And these natures are coemergent,

original: rang nyid las grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid las grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they are established from themselves.

original: 'di dag las skyes pa'i de kho na nyid byang chub kyi sems stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag las skyes pa'i de kho na nyid byang chub kyi sems stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'o //
translated: The reality that arises from these is the bodhicitta, the inseparability of emptiness and compassion.

original: de ci 'di shes rab kyi ye shes las gzhan pa kho na'am zhe na /
analyzed: de ci 'di shes rab kyi ye shes las gzhan pa kho na'am zhe na /
translated: Is this something other than the wisdom of wisdom?

original: gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin te /
translated: It is not other.

original: de kho na mi mthun phyogs bsal ba de ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'o zhes rang gi ngo bo rab tu gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de kho na mi mthun phyogs bsal ba de ni rnam pa 'di lta bu'o zhes rang gi ngo bo rab tu gsal ba'o //
translated: It is the very same reality, but it is the manifestation of its own nature, which is the removal of its counteragents.

original: lhan cig skyes pa shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo dag la goms pa las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'di kho na ni bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur te /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo dag la goms pa las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'di kho na ni bzhi pa phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur te /
translated: This very bodhicitta that arises from the cultivation of the coemergent wisdom of wisdom is the fourth empowerment, the mahƒÅmudrƒÅ empowerment,

original: rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma rnams thams cad dngos su 'dis 'khrud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma rnams thams cad dngos su 'dis 'khrud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it directly washes away all the stains of conceptuality.

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

original: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
translated: The fourth is just like that.

original: zhes so // lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na sna tshogs par ston pa gsungs pa de kho nar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na sna tshogs par ston pa gsungs pa de kho nar ni zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic reality of the connate is taught as the variety. That itself is stated by ‚Äújust that,‚Äù and so on.

original: bzang po'i ye shes de kho nar dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par sgro btags pa mtha' dag stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par de'i bdag nyid kyi thams cad gnas so //
analyzed: bzang po'i ye shes de kho nar dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par sgro btags pa mtha' dag stong pa nyid dang ro gcig par de'i bdag nyid kyi thams cad gnas so //
translated: That excellent pristine consciousness is just that, empty of all the superimpositions of things, nonthings, and so on, and is the nature of everything as one taste.

original: byis pa zhes pa byis pa rnams te so so'i skye ba'o //
analyzed: byis pa zhes pa byis pa rnams te so so'i skye ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Childish‚Äù refers to ordinary beings.

original: 'o na ji ltar bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo yang mi shes she na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo yang mi shes she na /
translated: ‚Äú If so, how is it that they do not know their own nature?‚Äù

original: gang phyir rmongs pa rnams te /
analyzed: gang phyir rmongs pa rnams te /
translated: Because of delusion,

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par 'dzin pa'i phyin ci log mi shes pa'i rmongs pa 'di rnams las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par 'dzin pa'i phyin ci log mi shes pa'i rmongs pa 'di rnams las skyes pa'o //
translated: this delusion of the error of apprehending things, nonthings, and so on arises.

original: ye shes de kho na nyid bcud de bde ba chen po dang bcud len te /
analyzed: ye shes de kho na nyid bcud de bde ba chen po dang bcud len te /
translated: That pristine consciousness is the essence of the elixir, great bliss, and the elixir.

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rgyas pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rgyas pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of the expansion of the qualities such as the powers and the fearlessnesses.

original: 'di ni khyad par la ste /
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par la ste /
translated: This is the distinction:

original: phyi rol gyi bcud la sogs pa rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi bcud la sogs pa rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: it is superior to the external nutriment, etc.

original: de lta kho nar goms bzhin pa'i ni bde ba chen po ster bar byed pa po ni ji ltar sna @175a * //
analyzed: de lta kho nar goms bzhin pa'i ni bde ba chen po ster bar byed pa po ni ji ltar sna @175a * //
translated: Thus, it is the bestower of great bliss,

original: tshogs pa'i rnam pa can dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i dngos po yang dag pa ji lta ba rtogs pa las sangs rgyas rnams te /
analyzed: tshogs pa'i rnam pa can dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i dngos po yang dag pa ji lta ba rtogs pa las sangs rgyas rnams te /
translated: the Buddhas, who are the realizers of the real entity which is free from the manifold aspects of entity, non-entity, etc.,

original: dri ma med pa nyid yongs su dag pas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnams des par gnas so //
analyzed: dri ma med pa nyid yongs su dag pas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin rnams des par gnas so //
translated: the powers, fearlessnesses, etc., which are of the nature of intuition, are well-established by virtue of their very purity.

original: 'dis ni sems kyi rdo rje'i rang gi ngo bo chos kyi sku gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni sems kyi rdo rje'i rang gi ngo bo chos kyi sku gsungs so //
translated: By this he explains the intrinsic reality of the mind-vajra, the Dharma Body.

original: dkyil 'khor zhes pa sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa can stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med par snyoms par zhugs pa'i lha'i ngo bo dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa skye ba dang 'chi ba dang 'gog
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zhes pa sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa can stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med par snyoms par zhugs pa'i lha'i ngo bo dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa skye ba dang 'chi ba dang 'gog
translated: The mandala is the essence of the deity that is the union of emptiness and compassion, which is the nature of the bliss that is differentiated by the divisions of joy and so on, which is the entity that is the various aspects of blue, yellow, and so on, and which is free from birth, death, and cessation.

original: pa'i ngo bo spro ba dang sdud pa'i byed pa po rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
analyzed: pa'i ngo bo spro ba dang sdud pa'i byed pa po rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
translated: The mandala is the nature of the deity who enters into union with emptiness and compassion inseparable, which has various aspects such as blue, yellow, and so on, and is differentiated by the divisions of joy and so on, which is the agent of emanation and withdrawal, which has the nature of great bliss, and which is the mandala circle of Vajrasattva.

original: bzang po ni rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: bzang po ni rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
translated: Excellent is the nature of completion.

original: bzhi ba'i don kho na bsgom bzhin pa grub par gyur pa ni dbang bzhi par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: bzhi ba'i don kho na bsgom bzhin pa grub par gyur pa ni dbang bzhi par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
translated: The one who is meditating on the meaning of the fourth, who has become accomplished, is the fourth empowerment.

original: der ni slob ma bzang dbang bskur //
analyzed: der ni slob ma bzang dbang bskur //
translated: There, the disciple is empowered with the excellent.

original: zhes te / gang bha ga'i dbus su bskyed pa'i rim pas dbang bskur ba de ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes te / gang bha ga'i dbus su bskyed pa'i rim pas dbang bskur ba de ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is the empowerment generated in the middle of the bhaga by means of the creation stage will be explained.

original: he ru ka zhes pa he ru ka bcom ldan 'das te /
analyzed: he ru ka zhes pa he ru ka bcom ldan 'das te /
translated: Heruka is Lord Heruka.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid do //üîΩpha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul las sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ston pas chos la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yan lag nyid kyis na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bdag nyid kyi
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid do // pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul las sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ston pas chos la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yan lag nyid kyis na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bdag nyid kyi
translated: It is the nature of the Enjoyment Body.

original: sku kho na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: sku kho na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: In the Perfection Vehicle, the Enjoyment Body is the body of the Bodhisattva who is the Lord of the tenth stage, which is the nature of the thirty-two and eighty minor marks, by the very fact that it is the enjoyment of the Dharma, teaching the profound and extensive Dharma to the Bodhisattvas.

original: 'dir ni 'di chos kyi sku'i dbang gi gdul bya'i ngor he ru ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis de lta de ltar sprul pa'i skur brjod do //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di chos kyi sku'i dbang gi gdul bya'i ngor he ru ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis de lta de ltar sprul pa'i skur brjod do //
translated: In this context, it is the Emanation Body, which is the form of Heruka, etc., for the sake of the disciples, by the power of the Dharma Body.

original: gang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i skur pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i skur pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la gsungs pa /
translated: The Emanation Body of the Buddhas is taught in the Perfection Vehicle.

original: de 'dir yang de 'dra ba kho na dang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yang ngo //
analyzed: de 'dir yang de 'dra ba kho na dang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yang ngo //
translated: It is just like that here, and also like an emanation.

original: chos kyi sku'i sprul pa nyid yin na yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg par log pa nyid de /
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i sprul pa nyid yin na yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg par log pa nyid de /
translated: Even though it is an emanation of the Dharma Body, the Enjoyment Body is the opposite in the Vehicle of the Perfections.

original: chos la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the enjoyment of the Dharma.

original: 'dir ni ngag gi ngo bo nyid kyis kyang ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni ngag gi ngo bo nyid kyis kyang ste /
translated: Here, it is also by the nature of speech.

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid kyang ro la rdzogs pa'i longs spyod pa nyid kyis kyang @175b ngo ;
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid kyang ro la rdzogs pa'i longs spyod pa nyid kyis kyang @175b ngo ;
translated: It is also the enjoyment of enjoyment in the enjoyment of taste.

original: ; mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag rtsa ba med par byas pa nyid kyi phyir dpa' ba'o //
analyzed: ; mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag rtsa ba med par byas pa nyid kyi phyir dpa' ba'o //
translated: It is heroic because it makes the discordant factors rootless.

original: nang du dang dkyil 'khor du yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bde ba chen po'i ro 'thung ba'i phyir dang chos kyi gsung gis skyong ba'i phyir bdag po'o //
analyzed: nang du dang dkyil 'khor du yang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bde ba chen po'i ro 'thung ba'i phyir dang chos kyi gsung gis skyong ba'i phyir bdag po'o //
translated: It is the lord because it drinks the taste of the great bliss of the twenty-four goddesses who will be explained as the inner and mandala wheels, and because it protects with the speech of Dharma.

original: mu mtha' med par rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sku spros pas gzhan gyi don gyi ngor rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul can nyid kyi phyir gtso bo'o //
analyzed: mu mtha' med par rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sku spros pas gzhan gyi don gyi ngor rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul can nyid kyi phyir gtso bo'o //

original: mkha' lding sbyor ba ni dug gzhil ba'i thabs te /
analyzed: mkha' lding sbyor ba ni dug gzhil ba'i thabs te /
translated: The method of counteracting poison is the application of the garu·∏ça.

original: mchog tu stong pa nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: mchog tu stong pa nyid kho na'o //
translated: The supreme is emptiness alone.

original: gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gsung bar 'gyur ba /
translated: As will be stated:

original: chos rnams thams cad stong pa la //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad stong pa la //
translated: ‚ÄúAll phenomena are empty.

original: sprul drug de las ji ltar yin //
analyzed: sprul drug de las ji ltar yin //

original: zhes so // stong pa nyid la lhag par mi mos pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // stong pa nyid la lhag par mi mos pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //

original: lha min sgrub pa zhes pa gang de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lha min sgrub pa zhes pa gang de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba ma yin pa de yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: dur khrod ces pa bskyed pa'i rim pa la dbugs rgyu'o zhes pa dang ro rnams gnas so zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis bdag med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can chos kyi dbyings gsal bar byed pa'i ro rnams kun nas gnas pa ni dur khrod
analyzed: dur khrod ces pa bskyed pa'i rim pa la dbugs rgyu'o zhes pa dang ro rnams gnas so zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis bdag med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can chos kyi dbyings gsal bar byed pa'i ro rnams kun nas gnas pa ni dur khrod
translated: The corpses that illuminate the dharmadhƒÅtu, which is characterized by selflessness, dwell in the cemetery.

original: de // brgyad kyi grangs su bcad pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de // brgyad kyi grangs su bcad pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The enumeration of eight will be explained.

analyzed: 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo'i lus kho na yan lag brgyad pa'i dur khrod do //

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid skyed par gsungs pa la /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid skyed par gsungs pa la /

original: 'di ni nges pa med pa'i dus kyis so zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'di ni nges pa med pa'i dus kyis so zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Here, it is said that it is produced in an unspecified time.

original: yud ces pa yis bskyed pa'i rgyu //üîΩzhes so // stong gsum du ni rdzu 'phrul che //
analyzed: yud ces pa yis bskyed pa'i rgyu // zhes so // stong gsum du ni rdzu 'phrul che //
translated: The cause of production is said to be ‚Äúin an instant.‚Äù

original: zhes pa stong gsum pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dpag tu med cing sna tshogs pa'i sprul ba'i ngo bo'i rdzu 'phrul chen po gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams de skad do //
analyzed: zhes pa stong gsum pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dpag tu med cing sna tshogs pa'i sprul ba'i ngo bo'i rdzu 'phrul chen po gang rnams kyi yin pa de rnams de skad do //

analyzed: 'dis ni sprul ba'i sku ni rdo rjer gsungs so //
translated: This is said to be the vajra of the emanation body.

original: snod kyi 'jig rten yang de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs pa /üîΩ'jig rten gyi khams zhes pa ste /
analyzed: snod kyi 'jig rten yang de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs pa / 'jig rten gyi khams zhes pa ste /

analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnams so //
translated: The world of the environment is said to be ‚Äúthe world systems.‚ÄùüîΩThe world systems are the world of the environment.

original: de nyid ces pa phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces pa phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: That itself is the Great Seal.

original: mchog tu dga' rtse'i gnas nyid kyi phyir lha mo'o //üîΩsangs rgyas @176a * //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' rtse'i gnas nyid kyi phyir lha mo'o // sangs rgyas @176a * //
translated: She is a goddess because she is the abode of supreme joy.üîΩShe is the mother of all the Buddhas

original: rnams thams cad bskyed pa ste rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rnams thams cad bskyed pa ste rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: because she is the nature of the causal state.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i dpal chen po ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i dpal chen po ste /
translated: She is the great glory of the Bodhisattvas

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: because she is the nature of the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su ni /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su ni /
translated: And in the state of the result,

original: shes rab pha rol phyin dpung gnyen //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin dpung gnyen //
translated: she is the ally of the perfection of wisdom.

original: zhes pas shes rab pha rol tu ste rab kyi mthar phyin par mchog tu bgrod cing mtha' dag par phyin pa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pas shes rab pha rol tu ste rab kyi mthar phyin par mchog tu bgrod cing mtha' dag par phyin pa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: She is the perfection of wisdom, because she is the supreme goal of the perfection of wisdom, the ultimate perfection.üîΩShe is the one who closes the door to the hells, because she is the one who abandons them.

original: dmyal ba'i sgo zhes pa de spong ba rnams kyi'o / ji skad du rgyal po rin po che'i phreng bar gsungs pa /
analyzed: dmyal ba'i sgo zhes pa de spong ba rnams kyi'o / ji skad du rgyal po rin po che'i phreng bar gsungs pa /
translated: As it says in the Ratnavali:

original: gzhan yang 'di zhes ngan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di zhes ngan pa'i phyir //
translated: And because of this,

original: rmongs pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can //
analyzed: rmongs pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can //
translated: the ignorant, who are proud of their learning,

original: 'di spong bdag nyid phung byas pa //
analyzed: 'di spong bdag nyid phung byas pa //
translated: The one who abandons this is destroyed by the aggregates.

original: 'og tu kha phyogs mnar med 'gro //
analyzed: 'og tu kha phyogs mnar med 'gro //
translated: Facing downward, he goes to Avƒ´ci.

original: zhes so // de kho na ni de kho na'o //
analyzed: zhes so // de kho na ni de kho na'o //
translated: Thatness is just thatness.

original: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba ni thar pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba ni thar pa'o //
translated: Freedom from all obscurations is liberation.

original: stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin las byung ba 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don gyi sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin las byung ba 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don gyi sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The great seal is the body of the purpose of the entire world, which arises from the nature of great bliss, which is the nature of great compassion, which is the object of the one taste of emptiness.

analyzed: gang du gang gi gzhan las yin pa ni 'di'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir grags chen no //

original: de nyid kyi phyir sems can kun la phan 'dod ma ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sems can kun la phan 'dod ma ste /
translated: For that very reason, it is the desire to benefit all sentient beings,

original: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: bde ba chen po'i rnam pas sna tshogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir ma'o //

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i rnam par dbye ba bsgom pas skyes pa nyid kyi phyir srid mo'i bu mo'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i rnam par dbye ba bsgom pas skyes pa nyid kyi phyir srid mo'i bu mo'o //

analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag gi rnam par dbye ba 'chad pa'i phyir sring mo'o //

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa bla na med pa'i yon tan nam mkha'i ba bzhon las 'jo ba'i phyir te bskyed pa'i phyir na bu mo'o //
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa bla na med pa'i yon tan nam mkha'i ba bzhon las 'jo ba'i phyir te bskyed pa'i phyir na bu mo'o //
translated: Daughter is used because the unexcelled qualities such as the powers and fearlessnesses are born from the horse of the sky.

analyzed: bla na med pa'i bde bas rjes su chags pa'i phyir bud med kyi shes pa bud med do //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rab tu gsal bas bag la nyal rnam par mkhyen nas ji ltar rigs par 'dzud cing dgod pa'i phyir sems can thams cad rjes su chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pas shes rab kho na bud med ces brjod do

translated: Woman is said to be wisdom alone because it is said, Wisdom is the woman who, through the perfection of wisdom, having understood the latent states, leads and establishes them in the proper way.

original: // skyes bur legs g-yo zhes pa legs par skyes bu rnams la g-yo ba ste /
analyzed: // skyes bur legs g-yo zhes pa legs par skyes bu rnams la g-yo ba ste /
translated: Skillful with men means skillful with good men.

original: @176b snying rje mchog gi zag pa med par med pa mur thug pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'i don sems can so so la bdag nyid kyi phong du gtod par byed pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: @176b snying rje mchog gi zag pa med par med pa mur thug pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'i don sems can so so la bdag nyid kyi phong du gtod par byed pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Because of the supreme compassion, the uncontaminated, the ultimate, the great bliss, the meaning is entrusted to each sentient being as one‚Äôs own wealth.

analyzed: las dang po pa'i sems can rnams kyis brtan par bya mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: shes rab ni spro ba med pa rtogs pa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang phyag rgya chen po zhes pa'i bar ro //

analyzed: bla na med pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams dang gzhan rnams kyang bcu gsum par 'chad par 'gyur ro //

original: bsod nams nye bar ma bsags pa de'i rang gi ngo bo ma rig pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs can rnams 'jigs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na 'jigs byed ma'o //
analyzed: bsod nams nye bar ma bsags pa de'i rang gi ngo bo ma rig pa nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs can rnams 'jigs pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir na 'jigs byed ma'o //
translated: Since the cause of fear for those who have not accumulated merit, whose nature is ignorance, those of the ≈õrƒÅvaka and other types, is itself, she is Bhairavƒ´.

original: de 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos gsungs pa /
analyzed: de 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated by ƒÄrya RƒÅhulabhadra:

original: byis pa rnams la 'jigs ston ma //
analyzed: byis pa rnams la 'jigs ston ma //
translated: She shows fear to the childish.

original: zhes so // phyin ci log pa ste chad pa dang sgro 'dogs pas lta ba'i'o //
analyzed: zhes so // phyin ci log pa ste chad pa dang sgro 'dogs pas lta ba'i'o //
translated: It is a view that is distorted, that is, that reifies or deprecates.

original: mtho ris dang byang grol las phyir phyogs pa'i dmyal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir 'jigs rung ngo //
analyzed: mtho ris dang byang grol las phyir phyogs pa'i dmyal ba'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir 'jigs rung ngo //

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated:

analyzed: khyod kyis ma mthong bas 'ching 'gyur //
translated: You are bound by not seeing it.

original: zhes so // 'gro ba drug 'jigs rung zhes kha cig tu klog pa de'i tshe 'jigs rung 'khor bo pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // 'gro ba drug 'jigs rung zhes kha cig tu klog pa de'i tshe 'jigs rung 'khor bo pa'o //

analyzed: de'i phyir shes rab gcig pu kho na 'di rnams kyi dang gzhan rnams kyi'ang mya ngan las 'das pa'o //

original: de 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
analyzed: de 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs pa /
translated: That is stated by the noble Nagarjuna:

original: 'khor ba yongs su shes kho na //
analyzed: 'khor ba yongs su shes kho na //

original: mya ngan 'das pa zhes par bshad //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa zhes par bshad //

original: ces so // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: ces so // dpal yang dag par sbyor ba'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also stated in the ShriparamƒÅdya Tantra:

original: kun rtog chung min mun pas zil mnan pa //
analyzed: kun rtog chung min mun pas zil mnan pa //
translated: Not a small conception, overcome by darkness,

original: rab tu bcom phyir myos pa'i glog 'gyur dang // chags so bzlog dka'i dri mas gos pa yis //
analyzed: rab tu bcom phyir myos pa'i glog 'gyur dang // chags so bzlog dka'i dri mas gos pa yis //

analyzed: sems ni 'khor bar rdo rje can gyis gsungs //

original: chags sogs dri mas gos pa rab spangs shing //
analyzed: chags sogs dri mas gos pa rab spangs shing //

analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa med pa de nyid ni //

analyzed: sems can mchog gis myang 'das mchog tu gsungs // de phyir sdug bsngal phung po mang po yi //

analyzed: rgyu mtshan rgyur pa de las gzhan ci'ang med //

analyzed: mtha' yas bde ba 'char ba'i rgyur gyur pa'ang //
translated: than that which is the cause of the arising of infinite bliss.

analyzed: @177a * // de las gzhan pa yod min thar 'dod rnams //

original: zhes so // mtha' yas pa'i bde ba yang dag par 'byor bas rdzu 'phrul chen po can no //
analyzed: zhes so // mtha' yas pa'i bde ba yang dag par 'byor bas rdzu 'phrul chen po can no //
translated: Because it is the cause of the perfect attainment of infinite bliss, it has great power.

original: 'khor ba rgyas par ston te /
analyzed: 'khor ba rgyas par ston te /
translated: It teaches the expansion of cyclic existence.

original: rnam rtog ces pa la sogs pa grangs kyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog ces pa la sogs pa grangs kyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The end of the enumeration is ‚Äúconceptualization‚Äù and so forth.

original: yod pa dang med pa dang rtag pa dang chad pa dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs par rtog pa ni rnam rtog ste /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa dang rtag pa dang chad pa dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs par rtog pa ni rnam rtog ste /
translated: The various kinds of conceptualization, such as existence and non-existence, eternalism and nihilism, subject and object, are conceptualizations.

original: de kho na rgyun du 'jug pa ni kun rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na rgyun du 'jug pa ni kun rtog pa'o //
translated: The continuous engagement in that is imagination.

original: 'char ba dang nub pa ni skye ba 'gog pa dag go //
analyzed: 'char ba dang nub pa ni skye ba 'gog pa dag go //
translated: The rising and setting are the cessation of origination.

original: de rtog pa'i thabs ston pa /
analyzed: de rtog pa'i thabs ston pa /
translated: The means of conceptualizing that is taught:

original: rnam par mi rtog ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äúnon-conceptualization,‚Äù etc.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa ci zhig rnams she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa ci zhig rnams she na gsungs pa /
translated: What is non-conceptualization? It is said:

original: dman pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dman pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äúinferior,‚Äù etc.

original: dman pa ni phra ba'i dngos po sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: dman pa ni phra ba'i dngos po sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The inferior is the subtle entity, the nature of mind and mental factors.

original: mchog ni byis pa'i bar la dngos po'i tha snyad can nyid kyi phyir na rags pa'i ngo bo'i dngos po'i lus kho na'o //
analyzed: mchog ni byis pa'i bar la dngos po'i tha snyad can nyid kyi phyir na rags pa'i ngo bo'i dngos po'i lus kho na'o //
translated: The superior is the gross entity, the body alone, because it is the basis of the conventions of entities up to the childish.

original: bar ma ni gnyis dag las gzhan a'a li dang k'a li dag go //
analyzed: bar ma ni gnyis dag las gzhan a'a li dang k'a li dag go //
translated: The middling is other than the two, the vowels and consonants.

original: de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnams ji ltar rigs par dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog gi tshig rnams kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnams ji ltar rigs par dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog gi tshig rnams kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the body, speech, and mind are taught by the words of the inferior, the middling, and the superior, as appropriate.

original: gzhan rnams ni dbang po drug rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan rnams ni dbang po drug rnams so //
translated: The others are the six sense faculties.

original: gang rnams de rnams zhes pa 'dis brtan pas gzhi la sogs pa'i rnams dang g-yo ba gzhan srog chags brjod do //
analyzed: gang rnams de rnams zhes pa 'dis brtan pas gzhi la sogs pa'i rnams dang g-yo ba gzhan srog chags brjod do //
translated: Those refers to the stable ones, such as the earth, etc., and the moving ones, the other living beings.

original: de kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
translated: It is said in the Hevajra Tantra:

original: dman pa phra ba'i tshig don te //
analyzed: dman pa phra ba'i tshig don te //
translated: The inferior is the subtle word-meaning,

original: mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya //
analyzed: mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya //
translated: the superior is said to be the entity,

original: bar ma gnyis ka spangs pa'o //
analyzed: bar ma gnyis ka spangs pa'o //
translated: the middling is the abandonment of both.üîΩThe others are the six sense faculties,

original: gzhan rnams zhes pa dbang po drug / gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g-yo //
analyzed: gzhan rnams zhes pa dbang po drug / gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g-yo //
translated: those are the stable and moving ones.

original: zhes so // dman pa la sogs pa rnam par mi rtog pa rtogs pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin 'di rnams bsgom bzhin pa rnams ni gsal por 'gyur zhes rkang pa brgyad pas ni ma yin zhes rnam par mi rtog pa'i sgras bsgom pa gsal bar byas so
analyzed: zhes so // dman pa la sogs pa rnam par mi rtog pa rtogs pa med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin 'di rnams bsgom bzhin pa rnams ni gsal por 'gyur zhes rkang pa brgyad pas ni ma yin zhes rnam par mi rtog pa'i sgras bsgom pa gsal bar byas so
translated: These, the nature of the non-conceptual innate, which is not inferior, etc., are cultivated, and they become clear. The eight lines beginning with ‚Äúnot‚Äù make clear the cultivation of the non-conceptual by the word ‚Äúnon-conceptual.‚Äù

original: // 'o na rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom pa zhes pa don ci zhe na /
analyzed: // 'o na rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom pa zhes pa don ci zhe na /

original: bde ba chen po'i thabs kyis chos thams cad mi bsam pa kho na ni bsgom pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i thabs kyis chos thams cad mi bsam pa kho na ni bsgom pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not think about any phenomena by means of the method of great bliss.

original: de ci bde ba chen po yid la byed pa skyon can ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ci bde ba chen po yid la byed pa skyon can ma yin no zhe na /

original: skyon can @177b yin pa yin te /
analyzed: skyon can @177b yin pa yin te /
translated: It is faulty.

original: de yang 'gro ba thams cad dang tha mi dad pa nyid kyis te /
analyzed: de yang 'gro ba thams cad dang tha mi dad pa nyid kyis te /
translated: Moreover, it is so because it is not different from all beings.

original: 'gro ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir la stong pa nyid bsam par nus pa yang ma yin zhes pas de yang yid la byed pa skyon pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir la stong pa nyid bsam par nus pa yang ma yin zhes pas de yang yid la byed pa skyon pa'o //
translated: Because beings are emptiness, and emptiness cannot be thought about. Thus, that is also a faulty mental attention.

original: sems pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ni nye bar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sems pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ni nye bar bstan pa'o //

original: ji skad du gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa /

analyzed: 'khrul pa rnams kyis nyer mkho'i chad //

original: 'khrul pa gzhan ni sel ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'khrul pa gzhan ni sel ba'i phyir //

original: zhes so // de'i phyir rnam par mi rtog par chos thams cad yongs su shes pa kho na rgyun gyis 'jug pa na don dam pa'i sgom pa zhes pa gdags par bya'o //

original: sems pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi phyir brtan pa nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe kho na mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: sems pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi phyir brtan pa nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe kho na mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor te /

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor kho na'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor kho na'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa la phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor med par yang mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor nye bar ston te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa la phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor med par yang mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor nye bar ston te /

original: bde ba chen po'i thabs kyis chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pas gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i thabs kyis chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pas gnas pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu nyi ma so sor dus gsum du aom buddha zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags par bya'o//

original: @180b de'i rjes su thod par yang de ltar 'gyur ro zhes pas thal ba sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @180b de'i rjes su thod par yang de ltar 'gyur ro zhes pas thal ba sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: After that, it will be so in the skull, and the consequence is established.

original: des zhes pa ni de ltar bsgrubs pa'i rdo rje gtsug gnur  bas so //
analyzed: des zhes pa ni de ltar bsgrubs pa'i rdo rje gtsug gnur  bas so //
translated: By that is by the vajra-peak as thus established.

original: de kho na zhes pa dgra bo'o //
analyzed: de kho na zhes pa dgra bo'o //
translated: That very one is the enemy.

original: sbyor ba gnyis pa gsungs /
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis pa gsungs /
translated: The second application is stated.

original: de kho na zhes pa bsgrub pas so //
analyzed: de kho na zhes pa bsgrub pas so //
translated: That very one is the one to be established.

original: mar khu bzang po ni skyes bu sbyangs pa'i mar khu ste des so //
analyzed: mar khu bzang po ni skyes bu sbyangs pa'i mar khu ste des so //
translated: Good ghee is the ghee of the purified person, and by that.

original: de rnams zhes pa gter rnams te /
analyzed: de rnams zhes pa gter rnams te /
translated: Those are the treasures.

original: bsdigs so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: bsdigs so zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: Threaten is the remainder.

original: thams cad ni gter rnams so //
analyzed: thams cad ni gter rnams so //
translated: All are the treasures.

original: sbyor ba gsum pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba gsum pa gsungs pa /
translated: The third application is stated:

original: thal ba des zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: thal ba des zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: By that ash, etc.

original: bsgrubs pas byugs te /
analyzed: bsgrubs pas byugs te /
translated: Having anointed with that which is established,

original: sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs shing mthe bos bskor nas kha sbub tu ltung bar byed do //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs shing mthe bos bskor nas kha sbub tu ltung bar byed do //
translated: having threatened with the threatening forefinger, having circled with the thumb, one should cause it to fall face down.

original: sbyor ba bzhi pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sbyor ba bzhi pa gsungs te /
translated: The fourth application is stated:

original: des zhes pa bsgrubs pas so //
analyzed: des zhes pa bsgrubs pas so //
translated: By that is by the one to be established.

original: thal ba de dang bdar zhing sbyangs pa'i zha nye'i phye ma dang rdo rje gtsug cha mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: thal ba de dang bdar zhing sbyangs pa'i zha nye'i phye ma dang rdo rje gtsug cha mnyam pa'o //
translated: The ash is equal to the borax and the iron powder.

original: cung zad ces pa zha nye'i phye las dman pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: cung zad ces pa zha nye'i phye las dman pa'i tshad do //
translated: A little means the measure of borax that is less.

original: 'di thams cad bsres par byas nas rdo rje mchu zhes pa phag nag po ste /
analyzed: 'di thams cad bsres par byas nas rdo rje mchu zhes pa phag nag po ste /
translated: Having mixed all this, the iron beak is a black pig.

original: de'i khu ba ni khrag go //
analyzed: de'i khu ba ni khrag go //
translated: Its juice is blood.

original: rdo rje dbyug pa zhes klog pa la ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i khu ba ni mi'i chu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyug pa zhes klog pa la ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i khu ba ni mi'i chu'o //
translated: If one reads vajra-danda, the juice of the vajra-danda is human urine.

original: des te khrag gam chus bsgos nas /
analyzed: des te khrag gam chus bsgos nas /
translated: With that, either blood or urine, having moistened,

original: phyi nas srang gang gi tshad kyi tsher mas dbug tu rung ba'i zangs ma'i snod du bzhag ste /
analyzed: phyi nas srang gang gi tshad kyi tsher mas dbug tu rung ba'i zangs ma'i snod du bzhag ste /
translated: then one should place the measure of one pala of iron powder in a copper vessel suitable for piercing with thorns.

original: rdo rje mchu'i khu bas sam mi'i gci bas bkang nas zhag bdun du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mchu'i khu bas sam mi'i gci bas bkang nas zhag bdun du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having filled it with the juice of the iron beak or human urine, one should meditate for seven days.

original: de'i rjes su mkhris pa chen pos te mi'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig zag bdun du snod de kho nar mnye bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes su mkhris pa chen pos te mi'i mkhris pa dang lhan cig zag bdun du snod de kho nar mnye bar bya'o //
translated: After that, with great bile, one should knead that vessel for seven days together with human bile.

original: de nas zhes snod nas so //
analyzed: de nas zhes snod nas so //
translated: Then, from the vessel,

original: lcags kyi snod du ste /
analyzed: lcags kyi snod du ste /
translated: in an iron vessel,

original: khab len gyi lcags kyi snod srang gi tshad khab kyis dbug tu rung bar rdo rje mchu la sogs pas bsgom pa la sogs pa byas nas gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: khab len gyi lcags kyi snod srang gi tshad khab kyis dbug tu rung bar rdo rje mchu la sogs pas bsgom pa la sogs pa byas nas gzhag par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should place it in an iron vessel that is suitable for piercing with a needle, having performed the meditation with vajra beak, and so forth.

analyzed: de zhes pa de'i zangs kyi snod dam lcags kyi snod do //

original: me la gzhag ste gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: me la gzhag ste gzhag par bya'o //

original: kha cig smra ba na bar chad med par 'bar ba'i sa gzhi la bzhag ste thob nas zhag bdun du gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: kha cig smra ba na bar chad med par 'bar ba'i sa gzhi la bzhag ste thob nas zhag bdun du gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Some say that it should be placed on the ground that is burning without obstruction, and after obtaining it, it should be placed for seven days.

original: gzhan smra ba ni gzhag ste bskol bar bya'o zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan smra ba ni gzhag ste bskol bar bya'o zer ro //

analyzed: de nas zangs kyi snod de gser du 'gyur zhing lcags kyi snod ni dngul du 'gyur ro //

original: gzhan rnams smra ba ni snod gang ci yang rung @181a * //
analyzed: gzhan rnams smra ba ni snod gang ci yang rung @181a * //
translated: Others say that any vessel whatsoever

original: bar dang por rdo rje mchu'i khu bas bsgos nas /
analyzed: bar dang por rdo rje mchu'i khu bas bsgos nas /
translated: first becomes smeared with the juice of vajra beak,üîΩand then it becomes gold or silver.

original: de nas phyung nas zangs kyi snod dang lcags kyi snod du bsgo ba dang mnye ba dang gzhag pa rnams byas nas zangs kyi snod dam lcags kyi snod de dang lhan cig me'i dbus su ste gzhag go zhes pa snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas phyung nas zangs kyi snod dang lcags kyi snod du bsgo ba dang mnye ba dang gzhag pa rnams byas nas zangs kyi snod dam lcags kyi snod de dang lhan cig me'i dbus su ste gzhag go zhes pa snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Then, having taken it out, it is placed in a copper vessel or an iron vessel, and having been heated, kneaded, and placed, it is placed in the middle of the fire together with the copper vessel or iron vessel, as before.

original: 'on kyang bskol ba'i phyogs la gzha' tshe'i phye ma dang khab len gyi phye ma zad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang bskol ba'i phyogs la gzha' tshe'i phye ma dang khab len gyi phye ma zad par bya'o //
translated: However, in the case of heating, the borax and iron filings are exhausted.

original: stong phrag ces pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
analyzed: stong phrag ces pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
translated: The thousand and so on are easy to understand.

original: sbyor ba lnga pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba lnga pa gsungs pa /
translated: The fifth application is stated:

original: de nyid kyis zhes pa grub pas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes pa grub pas so //
translated: By that alone means by the accomplishment.

original: nyi ma bzang po la tho rangs thal ba de gzhon nu ma'i mgor gzhag ste rdo rje gtsug phud kyis bkru'o //
analyzed: nyi ma bzang po la tho rangs thal ba de gzhon nu ma'i mgor gzhag ste rdo rje gtsug phud kyis bkru'o //

analyzed: spos lnga ni sgron ma lnga'i bdug pas rkang pa lnga'i sngags klog cing bdug par bya'o //
