original: sbyor ba drug pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba drug pa gsungs pa /
translated: The sixth application is stated:

original: yungs kar dkar po gzhon nu ma'i thod par bskrun nas de las skyes pa'i 'bras bu'i sngags 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas pas lan bdun du mngon par bsngags pa'o //
analyzed: yungs kar dkar po gzhon nu ma'i thod par bskrun nas de las skyes pa'i 'bras bu'i sngags 'dis sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas pas lan bdun du mngon par bsngags pa'o //
translated: Having planted white mustard seeds in the skull of a young girl, one should recite the mantra of the fruit that has grown from that one hundred thousand times.

analyzed: skar rtsis kyi cho ga 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzhon nu ma'i'am /
translated: By this ritual of astrology, one should strike the face of a young girl blessed by all the buddhas,

analyzed: sgrub pa po brtan pa nyid las gzhan gyi'ang gdong pa la sngags bzlog cing brdeg par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas gzhon nu ma de dgod do //

original: bzang po zhes pa bzang mo ste rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bzang po zhes pa bzang mo ste rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //

original: sbyor ba bdun pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: sbyor ba bdun pa gsungs pa /
translated: The sevenfold yoga is stated:

original: de'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHis‚Äù and so forth.

analyzed: thal ba'i ri lu rim gyis gser dang dngul dang zangs rnams kyis dkris nas de ma thag tu brjod pa'i sngags 'bum bzlas pa byas pas lan bdun du mngon par bsngags pas dro ba dang du ba dang 'bar ba'i rjes thogs su khar gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Having gradually wrapped the ash pill with gold, silver, and copper, immediately one should recite the mantra one hundred thousand times. By the sevenfold consecration, after heat, smoke, and flame, one should place it in one‚Äôs mouth.

analyzed: dngul gyi ni phyed dang bcas pa'i ra ti gnyis lhag pa'i drung nam bzhi'o //

analyzed: zangs ma'i ni ra ti lnga lhag pa'i drug nam lnga'o //

original: de gsungs pa /
analyzed: de gsungs pa /

original: phyed dang brgyad dang m'a sa gsum //
analyzed: phyed dang brgyad dang m'a sa gsum //

original: phyed dang gsum dang de @181b bzhin bzhi //
analyzed: phyed dang gsum dang de @181b bzhin bzhi //

original: ra ti lnga dang m'a sa gsum //
analyzed: ra ti lnga dang m'a sa gsum //
translated: five ratis and three masas‚Äî

original: ri lu bcing la yang dag nges //
analyzed: ri lu bcing la yang dag nges //
translated: bind the pill and it is well ascertained.

original: zhes so // 'jig rten gsum bsgrub pa'i sngags zhes pa grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: zhes so // 'jig rten gsum bsgrub pa'i sngags zhes pa grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so //

original: las kyis rjes su 'brang bas bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma dag gi sku mdog gi dbye ba brgyad par 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes pa mkhas pa aa bha ya a'a ka ra guptas mdzad pa'i 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: las kyis rjes su 'brang bas bcom ldan 'das dang bcom ldan 'das ma dag gi sku mdog gi dbye ba brgyad par 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes pa mkhas pa aa bha ya a'a ka ra guptas mdzad pa'i 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the second chapter in the commentary on the A ºbhaya Tantra composed by the scholar AbhayƒÅkaragupta.

analyzed: // / sngags bshad nas sngags kyi rang bzhin gyi sku dang rdzogs pa'i ngo bo yang bshad pa'i ched du gsungs pa /

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThen,‚Äù etc.

original: lha'i le'u zhes pa sngags las skyes pa rnams kyi dang / rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i lha rnams kyi le'u'o //
analyzed: lha'i le'u zhes pa sngags las skyes pa rnams kyi dang / rdzogs pa'i ngo bo'i lha rnams kyi le'u'o //
translated: The ‚Äúchapter on the deities‚Äù is the chapter on the deities born from the mantras and the deities of the nature of perfection.

analyzed: ram yig ces pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa ni gsal bar phyogs gcig tu 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The meditation on the ma·πá·∏çala wheel with the syllable ra·πÉ, etc., will be explained clearly in one place.

original: nang gi ni rdo rje sa gzhi zhes pa la sogs pa la rdo rje sa gzhi ni lte ba ste de'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: nang gi ni rdo rje sa gzhi zhes pa la sogs pa la rdo rje sa gzhi ni lte ba ste de'i dbus su'o //
translated: The inner is the vajra ground, etc. The vajra ground is the navel, in the middle of that.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ni ae yig bdag nyid chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la ni ae yig bdag nyid chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: In the completion stage, the great being of the letter E is the nature of the realm of reality.

original: ae yig yongs su gyur ba'i gru gsum ni chos 'byung sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: ae yig yongs su gyur ba'i gru gsum ni chos 'byung sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The triangle that is the transformation of the letter E is the source of phenomena, the emanation wheel.

original: khams gsum bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate the nature of the three realms.

original: gru gsum de'i dbus su ae yig gam lam yig sa bon te /
analyzed: gru gsum de'i dbus su ae yig gam lam yig sa bon te /
translated: In the center of that triangle is the seed syllable, the letter E or the letter L,

original: de yongs su gyur ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: which is the transformation of the earth mandala.

original: snying gar bam yig gam aom yig ni chos te sems yin zhing de'i bdag nyid ni de las byung ba ste /
analyzed: snying gar bam yig gam aom yig ni chos te sems yin zhing de'i bdag nyid ni de las byung ba ste /
translated: At the heart is the letter B or the letter O, which is the dharma, the mind, and its nature is that which arises from it.

original: 'khor lo chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The wheel is the dharma wheel.

original: rtsa rnams kun gyi ngo bo can //
analyzed: rtsa rnams kun gyi ngo bo can //
translated: It has the nature of all the channels.

original: zhes pa rtsa brgyad kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: zhes pa rtsa brgyad kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: It has the nature of the eight channels.

original: 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa rnams kyang bde ba chen po'i sems las tha mi dad pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi'i rtsa rnams kyang bde ba chen po'i sems las tha mi dad pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The channels of the four wheels are also of its nature because they are not different from the mind of great bliss.

original: mgo bo la /üîΩrnal 'byor ma ni rnam par gnas //
analyzed: mgo bo la / rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par gnas //
translated: In the headüîΩthe yoginis are situated.

original: zhes pa rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams te /
analyzed: zhes pa rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams te /

analyzed: khyad par du bde ba chen po'i gnas nas 'dzag pa byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa rnams gang du gnas pa'o //
translated: In particular, it is the place where the bodhicitta, which falls from the place of great bliss, remains.

original: bzang ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bzang ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is good because it is the nature of the wheel of great bliss.

original: rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa spyi'i @182a * //
analyzed: rtsa thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa spyi'i @182a * //
translated: The general and specific functions and names of these thirty-two channels, which are the nature of all channels, and the descent of bodhicitta in them,

original: las dang khyad par gyi las dang ming yang rgyud gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang bas bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: las dang khyad par gyi las dang ming yang rgyud gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang bas bshad par bya'o //
translated: should be explained in accordance with other tantras.

original: de la aa ba dh'u t'i ni byang chub kyi sems kho na 'bebs so //
analyzed: de la aa ba dh'u t'i ni byang chub kyi sems kho na 'bebs so //
translated: In that regard, the avadh≈´tƒ´ causes the descent of bodhicitta alone.

original: rkyang ma lte ba'i rtsa bar 'phyang bzhin pa ni zos pa dang 'thungs pa rnams lto ba'i mes smin pa rnams las zhu ba 'bebs so //
analyzed: rkyang ma lte ba'i rtsa bar 'phyang bzhin pa ni zos pa dang 'thungs pa rnams lto ba'i mes smin pa rnams las zhu ba 'bebs so //

analyzed: de las zhu ba 'di rtsa gzhan dang gzhan du rgyu bas lus mngon par khyab par byed do //
translated: From that, this refined essence moves through other channels and pervades the body.

original: ra sa n'a ni zhu ba las khrag 'bab po //
analyzed: ra sa n'a ni zhu ba las khrag 'bab po //
translated: The rasanƒÅ causes the descent of blood from the refined essence.

original: de'i phyir de yang de lta kho nar lus la khyab par byed do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang de lta kho nar lus la khyab par byed do //
translated: Therefore, it pervades the body in just that way.

original: kun gyi yang bsdu ba 'di yin te /üîΩmi phyed so dang sen mo 'bab //üîΩphra mo skra dang ba sbu 'byin //
analyzed: kun gyi yang bsdu ba 'di yin te / mi phyed so dang sen mo 'bab // phra mo skra dang ba sbu 'byin //
translated: This is the summary of all:üîΩThe one with the non-divided, the teeth and nails.

analyzed: rtsen mo pags pa dri ma 'bab // g-yon pa ma ni sha 'bab cing //
translated: The subtle, the hair of the head and body.üîΩThe one with play, the skin and dirt.

analyzed: mi'u thung ma zhag 'bab 'gyur // rus sbal skyes pa rus sbal 'dod //
translated: The left one, the flesh.üîΩThe dwarf, the fat.üîΩThe tortoise, the bones.

original: sbom pa mo 'gyur mkhal ma 'bab //
analyzed: sbom pa mo 'gyur mkhal ma 'bab //
translated: The thick one, the kidneys.

original: dbang bskur ma ni snying 'bab 'gyur //
analyzed: dbang bskur ma ni snying 'bab 'gyur //

analyzed: thams cad du ci ni spong ba la'o //

analyzed: dri ba lnga pa la lan zin pas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: des sgro btags pa rnams ni tha mal pa'o // rang bzhin yul ni dri ma med //

original: ces pa la /
analyzed: ces pa la /

analyzed: rang bzhin ni 'dir stong pa nyid de des gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga sems kyis rnam par bsgrubs pa lnga rnams dri ma 'dod chags pa bag chags dang bcas pa rnams legs par rtsad nas bton cing stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang rnams la yod pa

translated: The reply to the second question about the tƒ´rthika position is ‚ÄúThe gods are obscured by objects.‚Äù

analyzed: bde byed la sogs pa rnams yul rnams la nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi shes pa bsgrib par byas pa rnams te /
translated: The gods such as ≈öiva are obscured by objects, that is, they are obscured with respect to the knowledge of reality by the afflictions and the obscurations to omniscience.

original: de'i phyir de rnams la nang gi phyi'i dug yod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de rnams la nang gi phyi'i dug yod do //
translated: Therefore, they have internal and external poison.

original: 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba nyid kyis na dug zhi ba'i thabs byed cing /
analyzed: 'on kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba nyid kyis na dug zhi ba'i thabs byed cing /

original: dus su zin pa gsor mi rung bar smra'o //
analyzed: dus su zin pa gsor mi rung bar smra'o //
translated: They say that when the time has come, it cannot be cured.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gsungs par 'gyur ba /

original: rdzu 'phrul che la blo med pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul che la blo med pa /

original: zhes so // bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rtsad nas phyung ba'i bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa ni 'dod pa la spyod kyang mi 'ching ngo zhes stong pa yul zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rtsad nas phyung ba'i bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa ni 'dod pa la spyod kyang mi 'ching ngo zhes stong pa yul zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn BuddhakapƒÅla, who has uprooted all obscurations along with their traces, is not bound even though he indulges in desire.

original: de bzhin du spyod bzhin pa ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang longs spyod kyang mi dgos te sangs rgyas @187b thod pa'i rnal 'byor las so zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du spyod bzhin pa ni sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang longs spyod kyang mi dgos te sangs rgyas @187b thod pa'i rnal 'byor las so zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, even though the yogƒ´ of the BuddhakapƒÅla tantra indulges in enjoyments, he does not need to, because of the yoga of the BuddhakapƒÅla.

original: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

original: thams cad nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis mjug sdud pa /
analyzed: thams cad nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis mjug sdud pa /
translated: The summary is by way of illustrating everything.

original: de las dus zin med ces pa sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba las so //
analyzed: de las dus zin med ces pa sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba las so //
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no time limit‚Äù from the practice of the BuddhakapƒÅla.

original: de ltar don dam pa'i dug zhi thabs brjod nas kun rdzob pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar don dam pa'i dug zhi thabs brjod nas kun rdzob pa gsungs pa /
translated: Having stated the method of pacifying ultimate poison in that way, the conventional is stated.

original: sh'a ki li zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sh'a ki li zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú≈öƒÅkalya‚Äù and so on.

original: bsdams te yang dag par bsdams par sh'a li ka'i byed pa 'dir 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsdams te yang dag par bsdams par sh'a li ka'i byed pa 'dir 'gyur ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBinding‚Äù is restraining. ‚Äú≈öƒÅkalya‚Äù is the activity here.

original: mu stegs pa rnams dus su bzung ba gsor mi rung bar smra la bcom ldan 'das ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: mu stegs pa rnams dus su bzung ba gsor mi rung bar smra la bcom ldan 'das ni ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The non-Buddhists say that time is incurable, but the Lord does not.

original: de skad brjod nas klu rnams kyis //
analyzed: de skad brjod nas klu rnams kyis //
translated: Having said this, the nagas

original: sna tshogs sde mar phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: sna tshogs sde mar phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: bowed to the various armies

original: rang rang gnas rnams su ni song //
analyzed: rang rang gnas rnams su ni song //
translated: and went to their own abodes.

original: zhes pa sdud pa pos gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes pa sdud pa pos gsungs pa /

original: 'di 'dra zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di 'dra zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

original: rab tu rtogs pa zhes pa rang gi ngo bo nges par sems pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu rtogs pa zhes pa rang gi ngo bo nges par sems pa'o //
translated: Realization is the ascertainment of one's own nature.

original: aom zhes pa sku gsung thugs so //
analyzed: aom zhes pa sku gsung thugs so //
translated: Om is body, speech, and mind.

original: sh'un+ya rang bzhin med pa nyid do //
analyzed: sh'un+ya rang bzhin med pa nyid do //
translated: Shunya is the absence of inherent nature.

original: dzny'a ni thugs rje chen po'o //
analyzed: dzny'a ni thugs rje chen po'o //

original: de gsum dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin gang gi bdag nyid de rang gi ngo bo yin pa de nga'o //
analyzed: de gsum dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin gang gi bdag nyid de rang gi ngo bo yin pa de nga'o //
translated: Since those three are inseparable, the one whose nature is the nature of that vajra is I.

original: ji ltar de lta bu nga yin pa de ltar mtha' dag go zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar de lta bu nga yin pa de ltar mtha' dag go zhes gsungs pa /

original: stong dang stong min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: stong dang stong min zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: stong pa ste rang gi ngo bo dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: stong min te de ltar yang brjod du med pa nyid kyi phyir dang / gnyis dang bral ba'i ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir ro //

original: mtho lnga zhes pa sor drug cu pa rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du ste /
analyzed: mtho lnga zhes pa sor drug cu pa rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du ste /
translated: Five cubits means that the area of the ma·πá·∏çala is sixty finger breadths inside the basic line.

original: gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala is square.

original: zlum po ni sor sum cu pa ste /
analyzed: zlum po ni sor sum cu pa ste /

original: de nyid du rdo rje sngon po'i phreng bas bskor ba padma 'dab ma brgyad pa sor bcu pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid du rdo rje sngon po'i phreng bas bskor ba padma 'dab ma brgyad pa sor bcu pa'o //

original: rgyud gzhan du sa rko ba la sogs pas zug rngu dbyung ba la sogs pa sbyang ba gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyud gzhan du sa rko ba la sogs pas zug rngu dbyung ba la sogs pa sbyang ba gsungs so //
translated: In other tantras, the purification of removing splinters, and so on, by digging the ground, and so on, is taught.

original: 'dir ni mchog gi rgyud yin pa nyid kyi phyir na lag pas reg nas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sbyin sreg gi thab kyi sa gzhi yang sbyang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa /

translated: Here, because this is a supreme tantra, the ground of the ma·πá·∏çala is purified by touching it with the hand and reciting the mantra one hundred and eight times. The ground of the fire pit for the burnt offering is also purified.

original: sa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The ground and so forth.

original: 'dir dug gi thab kyi dbang du byas pa'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i stegs bu dang snam bu mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir dug gi thab kyi dbang du byas pa'i dkyil 'khor la lha'i stegs bu dang snam bu mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Here, in the case of the mandala that is the subject of the poison-sacrifice, one should not make the divine platforms and ledges.

analyzed: stegs bu na zhes pa la sogs pa'o // rdul tshon dmar pos zhes pa phyogs bzhi rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi gnas @188a * //

original: kun rdul tshon dmar po kho nas dgang bar bya'o //
analyzed: kun rdul tshon dmar po kho nas dgang bar bya'o //
translated: With red powder, in the four directions, one should fill the mandala site with only red powder.

original: ji ltar 'dus pa la sogs par rnam par snang mdzad la sos pa'i phyogs kyi dbye bas sa'i kha dog tha dad pa dpe ltar ma yin no zhes pa gsungs pa //
analyzed: ji ltar 'dus pa la sogs par rnam par snang mdzad la sos pa'i phyogs kyi dbye bas sa'i kha dog tha dad pa dpe ltar ma yin no zhes pa gsungs pa //
translated: It is not like the example of the different colors of the earth in the directions, as in the case of Vairocana in the Sa·πÉsƒÅrapaddhatis≈´tra and so forth.

original: gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The other and so forth.

original: re kh'a lnga la sogs pa gzhan ni kha dog lnga'i tshon rnams kyis ji ltar rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: re kh'a lnga la sogs pa gzhan ni kha dog lnga'i tshon rnams kyis ji ltar rigs par bya'o //
translated: The other, such as the five lines, should be made with the five-colored powders as appropriate.

original: gtor ma sbyin pa dang sa gzhi sbyar ba dang / thig pa bsngags pa dang / thig gdab pa dang / rdul tshon gdab pa la sogs pa ni he ru ka'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bla mas bya'o //
analyzed: gtor ma sbyin pa dang sa gzhi sbyar ba dang / thig pa bsngags pa dang / thig gdab pa dang / rdul tshon gdab pa la sogs pa ni he ru ka'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i bla mas bya'o //
translated: The teacher endowed with the yoga of Heruka should perform the offering of the sacrificial cake, the consecration of the ground, the consecration of the chalk line, the laying out of the chalk line, the laying out of the colored powders, and so forth.

original: bum pa rnams zhes pa rtsa ba mi nag pa lto ba dang mchu 'phyang ba dang / mgrin pa ring ba rnams te /
analyzed: bum pa rnams zhes pa rtsa ba mi nag pa lto ba dang mchu 'phyang ba dang / mgrin pa ring ba rnams te /
translated: The vases are those with a long neck, a round belly, and a wide mouth, and are not black at the base.

original: dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i mtshams su'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan dang me la sogs pa'i mtshams su'o //
translated: They are in the northeast, southeast, and so forth.

original: bum pa bzhi rnams su grangs ji lta bar mtshan ma bzhi rnams so //
analyzed: bum pa bzhi rnams su grangs ji lta bar mtshan ma bzhi rnams so //

original: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni lnga pa gtso bo'i ste /
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni lnga pa gtso bo'i ste /

original: 'dir ma brjod kyang rgyud gzhan gyi rigs pas shar sgo las cung zad lhor gtogs pas bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ma brjod kyang rgyud gzhan gyi rigs pas shar sgo las cung zad lhor gtogs pas bya'o //
translated: Although it is not mentioned here, by the logic of other tantras it should be placed in the east door, slightly south.

original: de kho na 'dir las thams cad pa ste /
analyzed: de kho na 'dir las thams cad pa ste /

original: 'dir mtshan ma ni chos 'byung dbus su cang te'u ste /
analyzed: 'dir mtshan ma ni chos 'byung dbus su cang te'u ste /

original: cang te'u'i steng du rdo rje dang padma'o //
analyzed: cang te'u'i steng du rdo rje dang padma'o //
translated: Above the hand-drum is a vajra and lotus.

original: slob dpon sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par 'gyur ro bya'o //
translated: The master becomes endowed with the yoga of BuddhakapƒÅla.

original: ji ltar zhen gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar zhen gsungs pa /
translated: How? He says:

original: padma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: padma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: sna tshogs padma'i lte bar ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i lte bar ro //
translated: In the center of the variegated lotus.

original: phyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /üîΩslob dpon rang nyid lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa' bstims pa'i rjes thogs su bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyis ni zhes pa la sogs pa la / slob dpon rang nyid lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa' bstims pa'i rjes thogs su bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: After that, etc.üîΩThe master himself, in the form of Heruka surrounded by the eight goddesses, having dissolved the awareness being, should confer initiation upon himself.

original: he ru ka'i sku las skyes pa'i 'od zer zhes pa snying ga'i rtsa brgyad rnams las spros pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la reg tu tu gzhug par bya ste slob dpon gyis so //
analyzed: he ru ka'i sku las skyes pa'i 'od zer zhes pa snying ga'i rtsa brgyad rnams las spros pa'i 'od zer dang bcas pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la reg tu tu gzhug par bya ste slob dpon gyis so //
translated: The light rays born from the body of Heruka, the eight goddesses, together with the light rays emanating from the eight channels at the heart, should be caused to touch the tathƒÅgatas, by the master.

original: lha mo de rnams dang byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis spros pa'i lha mo rnams kyis he ru ka dang lha mo brgyad rnams khrus byed du 'jug go //
analyzed: lha mo de rnams dang byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis spros pa'i lha mo rnams kyis he ru ka dang lha mo brgyad rnams khrus byed du 'jug go //
translated: Those goddesses and the goddesses emanated by the light rays of the Tathagatas who have come, cause Heruka and the eight goddesses to bathe.

original: cod pan can du zhes pa he ru ka cod pan can dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig ste /
analyzed: cod pan can du zhes pa he ru ka cod pan can dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig ste /

analyzed: de rnams kyang cod pan can zhes pa'i don to //
translated: They also are having a crown, is the meaning.

original: dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa zhes pa de ltar rang nyid he ru ka'i @188b bdag nyid du rdzogs pa na rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la yud kyis dam tshigs sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dang dbang bskur ba dang rgyas gdab pa rnam par bsgoms nas dkyil 'khorüîΩsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa zhes pa de ltar rang nyid he ru ka'i @188b bdag nyid du rdzogs pa na rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la yud kyis dam tshigs sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' dang dbang bskur ba dang rgyas gdab pa rnam par bsgoms nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having completed the mandala, means that when one has thus completed oneself in the nature of Heruka, one should visualize in an instant the pledge-being, the wisdom-being, the consecration, and the sealing in the mandala of colored particles, and then,

original: gtor ma zhes pa klu rnams la'o //
analyzed: gtor ma zhes pa klu rnams la'o //
translated: in order to accomplish the mandala, one should offer the bali to the Nagas.

original: mar me zhes pa sbrang rtsi dang mar dang nya'i tshil bu dang / dri zhim pa'i 'bru mar te mar me bzhi rnams dkyil 'khor dang nye bar sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: mar me zhes pa sbrang rtsi dang mar dang nya'i tshil bu dang / dri zhim pa'i 'bru mar te mar me bzhi rnams dkyil 'khor dang nye bar sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The four lamps are honey, butter, fish-oil, and fragrant oil.

original: aa mra dang na ri ke la dang chu shing dang / ka pittha'i 'bras bu bzhi rnams so //
analyzed: aa mra dang na ri ke la dang chu shing dang / ka pittha'i 'bras bu bzhi rnams so //
translated: The four fruits are mango, coconut, banana, and bread-fruit.

original: ras zung gsum ni smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs dang thod pa'o //
analyzed: ras zung gsum ni smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs dang thod pa'o //
translated: The three garments are the lower garment, the upper garment, and the shawl.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni rang nyid kyis phul ba'i bla ma'i shes rab ma dang dpa' bo ni bla ma'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni rang nyid kyis phul ba'i bla ma'i shes rab ma dang dpa' bo ni bla ma'o //
translated: The yoginƒ´ is the wisdom-consort of the guru who is offered by oneself. The hero is the guru.

original: 'khor lo ni tshogs 'du ba'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni tshogs 'du ba'o //
translated: The wheel is the assembly of the ga·πáa.

original: dam tshig snying por gcig sems kyis //üîΩzhes pa la /
analyzed: dam tshig snying por gcig sems kyis // zhes pa la /
translated: The pledge is the essence of mind.

original: dam tshig snying po ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: dam tshig snying po ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The pledge is the essence of the BhagavƒÅn.

original: bdag nyid dogs pa zlog byed pa //
analyzed: bdag nyid dogs pa zlog byed pa //
translated: The self is the one who removes doubt.

original: zhes pa dgongs pas dug byung gi dogs pa med pa la ni ma yin zhes pa'i don te //
analyzed: zhes pa dgongs pas dug byung gi dogs pa med pa la ni ma yin zhes pa'i don te //
translated: The meaning is that it is not the case that there is no doubt about the arising of poison.

original: brtan pa ni bong nga'i dug la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: brtan pa ni bong nga'i dug la sogs pa'o //
translated: The stable is the poison of the donkey, and so on.

original: g-yo ba ni sprul la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba ni sprul la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The moving is of the emanations, etc.

original: lus skyes ni lhog pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lus skyes ni lhog pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The bodily is of the abscesses, etc.

original: bcos ma ni mar dang sbrang rtsi la mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bcos ma ni mar dang sbrang rtsi la mnyam par sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The artificial is of the combination of butter and honey, etc.

original: rnam pa bzhi'i dang dug ni dug med par bgyi zhing ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi'i dang dug ni dug med par bgyi zhing ngo //
translated: The fourfold poison is to be made nonpoisonous.

original: shing bu ni so shing ngo //
analyzed: shing bu ni so shing ngo //
translated: The stick is the tooth stick.

original: slob ma ni he ru ka'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma ni he ru ka'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The disciple is to be visualized in the form of Heruka.

original: mgrin par zhes pa slob dpon gyi dang / slob ma'i'o //
analyzed: mgrin par zhes pa slob dpon gyi dang / slob ma'i'o //

original: lag par yang ste g-yon par ro //
analyzed: lag par yang ste g-yon par ro //
translated: Also at the hand, i.e., the left.

original: zla bar zhes pa mgrin par gnas pa dang lag par gnas pa la'o//
analyzed: zla bar zhes pa mgrin par gnas pa dang lag par gnas pa la'o//
translated: At the moon, i.e., at the throat and at the hand.

original: bsgom pa'i nus pas zhes pa he ru ka'i sku dang / zla ba la sogs pa sgom par byed cing /
analyzed: bsgom pa'i nus pas zhes pa he ru ka'i sku dang / zla ba la sogs pa sgom par byed cing /
translated: By the power of meditation, i.e., by meditating on the body of Heruka and the moon, etc.

original: de ltar bsgoms pa'i lag pa slob ma'i mgor bzhag nas sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms pa'i lag pa slob ma'i mgor bzhag nas sngags bzlas so //
translated: Having placed the hand, which is thus meditated, on the head of the disciple, one should recite the mantra.

original: bum pa zhes pa bum pa'i tshad do //
analyzed: bum pa zhes pa bum pa'i tshad do //
translated: The pot is the measure of the pot.

original: bzod dka' zhes pa sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: bzod dka' zhes pa sdug bsngal ba'o //

original: nam mkha' lding sbyor zhes pa la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe sems can 'dis mkha' lding gi sbyor ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag cag rnams la 'ga' zhig tu yang yongs su bskyab pa'i ched du brtan par bya ba nyid kyis rten du 'gyur ba
analyzed: nam mkha' lding sbyor zhes pa la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe sems can 'dis mkha' lding gi sbyor ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag cag rnams la 'ga' zhig tu yang yongs su bskyab pa'i ched du brtan par bya ba nyid kyis rten du 'gyur ba
translated: The line the application of the garu·∏ça and so on means that when this sentient being realizes the application of the garu·∏ça, at that time, for the purpose of protecting us, it will become a support by being steadfast.üîΩ

original: de ltar dug gi chu klung pa'i mthar thug pas rjes su bzung nas dug zhi thabs ri skegs kyi byed pa dang / don dam pa lung bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar dug gi chu klung pa'i mthar thug pas rjes su bzung nas dug zhi thabs ri skegs kyi byed pa dang / don dam pa lung bstan par bya'o //
translated: bird and the ultimate prophecy.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis aom buddha ka p'a li n'i a'a: h'um zhes pa 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par bsngags pa'i dug bza' bar bya'o //üîΩphyi @194a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis aom buddha ka p'a li n'i a'a: h'um zhes pa 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mngon par bsngags pa'i dug bza' bar bya'o // phyi @194a * //
translated: The yogin of Buddhakapala should eat the poison, having enchanted it twenty-one times with Om Buddhakapalini Ah Hum.

original: rol gyi sar zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi gnas la ste /üîΩdkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol nas so //
analyzed: rol gyi sar zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyi gnas la ste / dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol nas so //
translated: On the outer ground means in the mandala place.

original: 'dis zhes pa brjod zin pas te /
analyzed: 'dis zhes pa brjod zin pas te /
translated: Having requested the mandala to depart, by this means by what has been stated.

original: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dgu'i bdag nyid mchod par bya'o zhes pa sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dgu'i bdag nyid mchod par bya'o zhes pa sngar bzhin no //
translated: The mandala of colored powder, having the nature of the nine, should be worshipped, as before.

original: yang na spub pa po sems brtan pa he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyis brjod zin pa'i mchod pa'i sngags 'dis rim pa ji lta bar mchod par bya'o zhes 'brel lo //
analyzed: yang na spub pa po sems brtan pa he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyis brjod zin pa'i mchod pa'i sngags 'dis rim pa ji lta bar mchod par bya'o zhes 'brel lo //
translated: Or, the one who is the concealer, having a firm mind, by the nature of Heruka, should worship in the proper order with the mantra of worship stated by by this.

original: dkyil 'khor ni tsandan la sogs pas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni tsandan la sogs pas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The mandala is with sandalwood, etc.

original: dkar po'i lus can zhes pa dkar po'i yon tan gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dkar po'i lus can zhes pa dkar po'i yon tan gyi tshogs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Having a white body means having a collection of the qualities of white.

original: me shigs pa ni mgo bo med pa ste /
analyzed: me shigs pa ni mgo bo med pa ste /
translated: The headless is the one without a head.

original: bde ba'i gnas kyi nang du'o zhes pa man ngag go //
analyzed: bde ba'i gnas kyi nang du'o zhes pa man ngag go //
translated: The place of bliss is the inner place.

original: snod kyi kha ni bum pa'i kha'o //
analyzed: snod kyi kha ni bum pa'i kha'o //
translated: The mouth of the vessel is the mouth of the vase.

original: zla ba zhes pa zla ba zhu bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba zhes pa zla ba zhu bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The moon is the melted moon.

original: langs par zhes pa ldang bar byed do zhes pa'o //
analyzed: langs par zhes pa ldang bar byed do zhes pa'o //
translated: The arising is the arising.

original: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po'i 'grel pa mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sbas pas mdzad pa mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po'i 'grel pa mkhas pa mi 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas kyi sbas pas mdzad pa mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bzhi pa'o /
translated: The commentary on the great tantra Buddhakapala composed by the scholar Abhayadattavara is the fourth chapter of the commentary on the text Abhaya.

original: // / bcud len rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / bcud len rgyas par ston pa gsungs pa /
translated: The teaching on the extensive alchemy is stated:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: zla ba drug tu zhes pa snar blugs bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu zhes pa snar blugs bya'o //
translated: For six months is to be inserted.

original: zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: The rest is the same.

original: shes rab bya rog ma ni gang gi gzugs dang kha dog bya rog gi lta bu ste lus nag po'o //
analyzed: shes rab bya rog ma ni gang gi gzugs dang kha dog bya rog gi lta bu ste lus nag po'o //
translated: The crow wisdom is one whose form and color are like a crow, that is, whose body is black.

original: ngang pa mo ni shes rab ste gang gi gzugs ngang pa'i bye brag ga bzhin du dkar ba'o //üîΩdrod ma ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: ngang pa mo ni shes rab ste gang gi gzugs ngang pa'i bye brag ga bzhin du dkar ba'o //üîΩdrod ma ni shes rab ste /
translated: The goose wisdom is one whose form is like a particular goose, that is, white.üîΩThe heat wisdom is one whose form is like a particular bird, that is, red.

original: gang gi drod gzugs te sngon po dang dkar po bsres pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi drod gzugs te sngon po dang dkar po bsres pa'o //
translated: The heat-form is a mixture of blue and white.

original: kha cig ni dog sngon po ste drod gzugs zhes pa ni rtag tu 'di'i lus dro ba'o zhes zer ro zhes pa shes rab rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: kha cig ni dog sngon po ste drod gzugs zhes pa ni rtag tu 'di'i lus dro ba'o zhes zer ro zhes pa shes rab rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Some say that the blue is the heat-form, since the body is always warm.

original: de la bya rog ma'i rdul ni nag po'i phyogs la byung ba gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la bya rog ma'i rdul ni nag po'i phyogs la byung ba gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The crow-like is to be taken as occurring in the dark fortnight.

original: ngang pa ma'i dkar po'i phyogs la byung ba'o //
analyzed: ngang pa ma'i dkar po'i phyogs la byung ba'o //
translated: The goose-like occurs in the bright fortnight.

original: drod ma'i phyogs gnyis ka la byung ba'o //
analyzed: drod ma'i phyogs gnyis ka la byung ba'o //
translated: The heat-like occurs in both fortnights.

original: gzhon nu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
translated: The characteristics of the young girl, etc., are stated.

original: sngo sangs ni bya rog ma ste mig sngo bas khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: sngo sangs ni bya rog ma ste mig sngo bas khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: The blue-green is the crow-like, distinguished by blue eyes.

original: de'i lo bco brgyad ma ni rdzas mig rnag dang kha sbyar sbyor ba zhes thabs dang yang dag par sbyar ba'i sbyor ba las skyes pa'i gnyi ga'i byang chub kyi sems @194b dang de'i rdul zhes pa gsum gzhon nu ma can du brjod do //
analyzed: de'i lo bco brgyad ma ni rdzas mig rnag dang kha sbyar sbyor ba zhes thabs dang yang dag par sbyar ba'i sbyor ba las skyes pa'i gnyi ga'i byang chub kyi sems @194b dang de'i rdul zhes pa gsum gzhon nu ma can du brjod do //
translated: Her eighteen-year-old form is called the young girl, since it is born from the union of the substance, the eye-pus, with the union of the method, the bodhicitta of both, and her heat-form.

original: shes rab ma gsum po de rnams su byung bas na der byung ngo //
analyzed: shes rab ma gsum po de rnams su byung bas na der byung ngo //
translated: Since those three wisdom women arise in those, they arise there.

original: de rnams su yang de ci'i yin zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de rnams su yang de ci'i yin zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Why are they there?

original: rtsa rnams kyi ste aa ba dh'u t'i la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rtsa rnams kyi ste aa ba dh'u t'i la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: In the channels, in the avadh≈´tƒ´, etc.

original: padma skyes ni chos 'byung du skyes pa'i rdzas byang chub sems so //
analyzed: padma skyes ni chos 'byung du skyes pa'i rdzas byang chub sems so //
translated: The lotus-born substance is the bodhicitta substance born in the dharma source.

original: de'i yang ci zhig tu gnas she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i yang ci zhig tu gnas she na gsungs pa /
translated: Where does that abide?

original: ge sar du ste rtsa tshogs par ro //
analyzed: ge sar du ste rtsa tshogs par ro //
translated: In the stamen, in the gathering of channels.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction?

original: sbas pa'i spyod yul du ste /
analyzed: sbas pa'i spyod yul du ste /
translated: In the hidden domain.

original: sbas pa'i spyod yul ni gang gis rdzas gnas pa'i yul te /
analyzed: sbas pa'i spyod yul ni gang gis rdzas gnas pa'i yul te /
translated: The hidden domain is the place where the substance abides.

original: lte ba nas byung nas ge sar du gnas pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: lte ba nas byung nas ge sar du gnas pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it arises from the navel and abides in the stamen.

original: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is as follows.

original: shes rab ma gsum po rnams las gang yang rung ba lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang sbyor ba las skyes pa'i gnyi ga'i byang chub kyi sems dang de'i rdul dang po gnyis sh'a li k'a'o //
analyzed: shes rab ma gsum po rnams las gang yang rung ba lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang sbyor ba las skyes pa'i gnyi ga'i byang chub kyi sems dang de'i rdul dang po gnyis sh'a li k'a'o //
translated: From among the three wisdom women, one who is twelve years old, from the union, the bodhicitta of both is born, and the first two particles are ≈öƒÅri.

original: me tog ldan pa zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: me tog ldan pa zhes pa la sogs pa la /
translated: The having flowers and so on means:

original: bya rog ma lo bcu drug lon pa rdul dang ldan pa dang sbyar ba las byung ba'i gnyi ga'i byang chub kyi sems ni grub ma'o //
analyzed: bya rog ma lo bcu drug lon pa rdul dang ldan pa dang sbyar ba las byung ba'i gnyi ga'i byang chub kyi sems ni grub ma'o //
translated: The bodhicitta of both, which arises from the union with a crow-faced woman of sixteen years, who is endowed with dust, is the accomplished one.

original: nyer spyod tha mi dad pa zhes pa ni spyod ba mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: nyer spyod tha mi dad pa zhes pa ni spyod ba mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The non-different enjoyments means the same enjoyment.

original: mi mo ni shes rab ma gsum las gang yang rung ba'o //
analyzed: mi mo ni shes rab ma gsum las gang yang rung ba'o //
translated: The woman is any one of the three wisdom women.

original: ma nyams ma ni skyes pa gzhan gyis ma bgrod pa ste /
analyzed: ma nyams ma ni skyes pa gzhan gyis ma bgrod pa ste /
translated: The uncorrupted means not penetrated by another man,

original: skye gnas ma nyams pa zhes pa'i don te /
analyzed: skye gnas ma nyams pa zhes pa'i don te /
translated: meaning the uncorrupted womb.

original: de las dang por byung ba zhes pa de lo nyi shu ma zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i nyi ma dang po las byung ba'i rdul dang / de'i tshe kho na de dang sbyar ba las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes pa gnyis ni byis pa can ma'o //
analyzed: de las dang por byung ba zhes pa de lo nyi shu ma zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i nyi ma dang po las byung ba'i rdul dang / de'i tshe kho na de dang sbyar ba las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes pa gnyis ni byis pa can ma'o //
translated: The first means the bodhicitta that arises from the union with her on the first day of her menstrual period, which is the first day of her twenty-year period, and the bodhicitta that arises at that very time from the union with her, who is endowed with dust, are the two with a child.

original: lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa la sogs pa shes rab gsum po gang yang rung ba lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma dang sbyar ba'i gnyi ga'i khu ba dang / bud med shi ba'i shi ba'i thod pa'i rtsa las byung ba'i 'bru mar zhes pa gnyis ni thod pa can ma'o //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa la sogs pa shes rab gsum po gang yang rung ba lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma dang sbyar ba'i gnyi ga'i khu ba dang / bud med shi ba'i shi ba'i thod pa'i rtsa las byung ba'i 'bru mar zhes pa gnyis ni thod pa can ma'o //
translated: The congenital and so forth refers to the two kinds of seminal fluid of a woman who is twenty-five years old or more and who has any of the three kinds of wisdom, and the oil from the veins of a dead woman's skull.

original: sman lnga po 'di rnams dngul chu dang sbyangs pa ra ti re dang lhan cig rim pa ji bzhin du zla ba drug dang gsum dang gcig dang phyed dang gnyis dang gcig rnams su 'chad par snga dro sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sman lnga po 'di rnams dngul chu dang sbyangs pa ra ti re dang lhan cig rim pa ji bzhin du zla ba drug dang gsum dang gcig dang phyed dang gnyis dang gcig rnams su 'chad par snga dro sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: These five medicines, together with mercury, are to be taken in the morning for six, three, one, half, two, and one month, respectively, together with one ratti each.

original: de la sman bya rog ma sna bug ga yon par rlung rgyu ba'i dus su snar blugs par bya'o //üîΩsman dang pa ma ni g-yas kyis so //
analyzed: de la sman bya rog ma sna bug ga yon par rlung rgyu ba'i dus su snar blugs par bya'o // sman dang pa ma ni g-yas kyis so //
translated: The medicine crow's foot is to be inserted into the left nostril at the time of the movement of the wind.üîΩ The medicine mango is to be inserted into the right nostril.

original: drod ma ni gnyi ga nas so zhes gsungs @195a * //
analyzed: drod ma ni gnyi ga nas so zhes gsungs @195a * //
translated: The medicine hot is to be inserted into both nostrils.

original: pa ; zla ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pa ; zla ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is stated in moon and so forth.

original: zla ba ni 'dir rkyang ma'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: zla ba ni 'dir rkyang ma'i rlung ngo //
translated: Here, moon is the solitary wind.

original: nyi ma ni ro ma'i rlung ngo //
analyzed: nyi ma ni ro ma'i rlung ngo //
translated: The sun is the semen.

original: zla ba ni khu ba'o //
analyzed: zla ba ni khu ba'o //
translated: The moon is the semen.

original: nyi ma zhes pa rdul lo //üîΩgal te sman de la khu ba shas che na de'i tshe sna bug g-yon pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma zhes pa rdul lo // gal te sman de la khu ba shas che na de'i tshe sna bug g-yon pa'o //
translated: The sun is the semen.üîΩIf the semen is predominant in that medicine, then it is in the left nostril.

original: ci ste rdul shas che na de'i tshe g-yas nas so ;
analyzed: ci ste rdul shas che na de'i tshe g-yas nas so ;
translated: If the semen is predominant, then it is in the right.

original: ; de nas 'di las zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //üîΩrnal 'byor ma'i mchog ces pa bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
analyzed: ; de nas 'di las zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o // rnal 'byor ma'i mchog ces pa bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
translated: Then, ‚Äúfrom this‚Äù and so forth is easy to understand.üîΩThe ‚Äúsupreme yoginƒ´s‚Äù are the five nectars, the yoginƒ´s.

original: rnal 'byor mchog rnams ni thabs sgron ma lnga rnams so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor mchog rnams ni thabs sgron ma lnga rnams so //
translated: The ‚Äúsupreme yogins‚Äù are the five lamps, the methods.

original: nus te bza' bar zhes pa lhag ma'o //
analyzed: nus te bza' bar zhes pa lhag ma'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should eat‚Äù is the remainder.

original: rnam rtog ni rnam rtog rnams so ;üîΩ; de bzhin gshegs pas mi rtogs so zhes pa la sogs pa'i phul du byung bas brjod pa ni /
analyzed: rnam rtog ni rnam rtog rnams so ; ; de bzhin gshegs pas mi rtogs so zhes pa la sogs pa'i phul du byung bas brjod pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúConceptualization‚Äù is the conceptualizations.

original: gus pa bskyed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gus pa bskyed pa'i don du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe TathƒÅgata does not conceptualize‚Äù and so on is stated for the purpose of generating respect.

original: 'o na su rnams kyis rtogs she na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na su rnams kyis rtogs she na gsungs pa /
translated: ‚ÄúWho‚Äù understands?

original: bla ma la gus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bla ma la gus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is said, ‚Äúthose who have devotion to the guru,‚Äù and so on.

original: rtag pa la sogs pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid bsgoms pas 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba rnams so //
analyzed: rtag pa la sogs pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid bsgoms pas 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba rnams so //
translated: By meditating on emptiness that transcends the extremes of permanence and so forth, they are free from attachment and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs thams cad rnam spangs pa /
translated: For that very reason, having abandoned all afflictions,

original: 'di rnams kyis zil gyis mnan pa'o //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis zil gyis mnan pa'o //
translated: they are victorious over these.

original: bza' ba la sogs pa la ma zhen pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba la sogs pa la ma zhen pa'o //
translated: They are not attached to food and so forth.

original: shes rab thabs sogs kyis zhes pa reg bya la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis so //
analyzed: shes rab thabs sogs kyis zhes pa reg bya la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis so //
translated: By wisdom, means, and so forth, it refers to the five sense objects, such as tactile objects.

original: phyogs gcig gis zhes pa phyogs gcig gis te /
analyzed: phyogs gcig gis zhes pa phyogs gcig gis te /
translated: By one side, it means by one side.

original: bla na med pa'i shes rab dang thabs dag gcig gi ngo bos de kho na nyid mnyam par gzhag par dang ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs dag tu sgom par byed pas 'grub po zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i shes rab dang thabs dag gcig gi ngo bos de kho na nyid mnyam par gzhag par dang ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs dag tu sgom par byed pas 'grub po zhes pa'i don to //
translated: It means that by meditating on reality in the context of equipoise and nonequipoise with the nature of one of unsurpassed wisdom and means, it is accomplished.

original: de kho na nyid sgom pa kho na la lhur len pa nyid kyi don du yul la zhen pa spangs pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: de kho na nyid sgom pa kho na la lhur len pa nyid kyi don du yul la zhen pa spangs pa gsungs pa /
translated: In order to be intent solely on meditating on reality, it is said that one should abandon attachment to objects:

original: kye lags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kye lags zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: O! and so forth.

original: cal col ni 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: cal col ni 'gal ba'o //
translated: Chatter is contradiction.

original: ci zhe na gang dbang po rnams kyis gnod cing yul rnams la kun nas zhen pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhe na gang dbang po rnams kyis gnod cing yul rnams la kun nas zhen pa'o //
translated: What? That which is harmed by the senses and is attached to objects.

original: sems can 'di ste mngon par zhen pa'i skye bo rnams so //
analyzed: sems can 'di ste mngon par zhen pa'i skye bo rnams so //
translated: This sentient being is the one who is attached, the people.

original: h'a h'a zhes pa mya ngan no //
analyzed: h'a h'a zhes pa mya ngan no //
translated: Ha ha is sorrow.

original: cal col ni de kho na nyid sgom pa las gzhan bza' ba dang / btung ba la sogs pa la sems g-yeng ba'o //üîΩgrab ma ni gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: cal col ni de kho na nyid sgom pa las gzhan bza' ba dang / btung ba la sogs pa la sems g-yeng ba'o // grab ma ni gzugs brnyan no //
translated: Chatter is the distraction of the mind from the meditation on reality to food, drink, and so on.

original: gnyug ma'i bdag po zhes pa gnyug ma'i bdag po @195b rnams te me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyug ma'i bdag po zhes pa gnyug ma'i bdag po @195b rnams te me long lta bu la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: The original lord is the original lord, the five Tathagatas Vairochana and so on, who are the nature of the five wisdoms such as the mirror-like wisdom, and are accomplished.

original: rnal 'byor pa de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the yogi becomes their nature.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u lnga ba'o /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u lnga ba'o /
translated: This is the fifth chapter in the commentary on the fearless one.

original: // / dbang bskur nas de kho na nyid gsal bar bya zhing /
analyzed: // / dbang bskur nas de kho na nyid gsal bar bya zhing /
translated: Having conferred the initiation, one should clarify reality.

original: dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor sngon ma can te /
analyzed: dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor sngon ma can te /
translated: Having conferred initiation, the mandala is the same as before.

original: de nas slob ma dbang po mchog yid kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes rtogs par bya ba'i don du gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas slob ma dbang po mchog yid kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes rtogs par bya ba'i don du gsungs pa /
translated: Then, in order to understand that the disciple of highest acumen should be initiated into the mind-made mandala, it is said:

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la mngon par zhen pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la mngon par zhen pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o //
translated: It is frightening because it frightens those who are attached to the external mandala.

original: dbang po rnon po dga' ba'i gnas nyid kyi phyir bzang ba ste yid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnon po dga' ba'i gnas nyid kyi phyir bzang ba ste yid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: It is good because it is the abode of the delight of those of highest acumen, and it is mental.

original: mchog ni 'jigs par byed pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ni 'jigs par byed pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: It is supreme because it produces the fruit of frightening.

original: gang gis zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyis so //üîΩshes rab thabs kyi sgrub pa ni //
analyzed: gang gis zhes pa dkyil 'khor gyis so // shes rab thabs kyi sgrub pa ni //
translated: By which means, i.e., by the mandala.üîΩThe practice of wisdom and means

original: zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dag gi sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa shes rab dang thabs dag gi sgrub pa ste /
translated: is the practice of wisdom and means.

original: des rjes su bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: des rjes su bsgrub pa'o //
translated: It is to be accomplished by that.

original: mtha' ni bya gdong gi rtse mo ste de dang sbyor zhing 'brel ba'o zhes pa mtha' la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: mtha' ni bya gdong gi rtse mo ste de dang sbyor zhing 'brel ba'o zhes pa mtha' la sbyor ba'o //
translated: The end is the peak of the bird face, and it is connected with that.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The outer mandala is the mandala of colored powder.

original: lha nyid gzhig pa tsam gyis zhes pa bag med pa las lhag gshegs sum ma gsol ba'i rdul tshon bshig pas zhes rtogs par bya ste /
analyzed: lha nyid gzhig pa tsam gyis zhes pa bag med pa las lhag gshegs sum ma gsol ba'i rdul tshon bshig pas zhes rtogs par bya ste /
translated: Just by destroying the deity means that one should understand that the colored powder is destroyed by the request for the deity to depart due to carelessness.

original: gzhan du na snga phyi dang rgyud gzhan rnams dang 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du na snga phyi dang rgyud gzhan rnams dang 'gal ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, there would be a contradiction with the earlier and later [texts] and other tantras.

original: de nyid kyi phyir lha bshig pa srid pa nyid kyi phyir dul tshon gyi lha la gzung 'dzin du 'dzin pas dag pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir lha bshig pa srid pa nyid kyi phyir dul tshon gyi lha la gzung 'dzin du 'dzin pas dag pa ste /
translated: For that very reason, since the destruction of the deity is possible, the colored powder deity is pure due to grasping subject and object.

original: gnyis med ye shes kyi bdag nyid med cing yid rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la ni yod do zhes mngon par dgongs so //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes kyi bdag nyid med cing yid rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la ni yod do zhes mngon par dgongs so //
translated: It is the intention that it does not exist in the natural mandala of the mind, which is the nature of nondual wisdom.

original: lha bshig pa bzhin du de'i mtshan ma bshig na yang sdig pa'o zhes gsungs so /
analyzed: lha bshig pa bzhin du de'i mtshan ma bshig na yang sdig pa'o zhes gsungs so /
translated: It is said that if the sign of the deity is destroyed like the deity, it is a sin.

original: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bdag po rnams kyi mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi bdag po rnams kyi mtshan ma ste /
translated: The vajra and so forth are the signs of the lords of the families of Akshobhya and so forth.

original: yang yid las tsha bon rnams dang / lha gzhan rnams kyi yang ngo zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang yid las tsha bon rnams dang / lha gzhan rnams kyi yang ngo zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: And one should know that the seed syllables are the seed syllables of the other deities.

original: song nas zhes pa 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: song nas zhes pa 'gro ba'o //
translated: Having gone means having gone to the place of the deities.

original: don dam par ni yang sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ste ci yis te ci zhig gis kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni yang sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa ste ci yis te ci zhig gis kyang ma yin no //
translated: Ultimately, the Buddha and so forth are not anything at all.

original: spyan @196a * //
analyzed: spyan @196a * //
translated: The eyes are the eyes of the deities.

original: drang ba la sogs pa ni sems can dman pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: drang ba la sogs pa ni sems can dman pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The invitation and so forth are taught for the sake of beings of lesser aspiration.

original: 'gar yang zhes pa don dam par 'ga' zhig tu yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gar yang zhes pa don dam par 'ga' zhig tu yang ma yin no //
translated: Nowhere means ultimately, in no place at all.

original: de 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gsungs pa /
analyzed: de 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gsungs pa /
translated: This is taught in the noble Perfection of Wisdom:

original: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang las kyang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang las kyang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do //
translated: Son of noble family, the Tathagatas do not come from anywhere, nor do they go anywhere.

original: de bzhin nyid ni mi g-yo ba ste de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ni mi g-yo ba ste de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes so //

original: dri ma med ces pa dri ma med pa rnams te 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dri ma med ces pa dri ma med pa rnams te 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir dag pa chos sku rnams so //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir dag pa chos sku rnams so //
translated: They are the pure dharmakƒÅya because they are free from the obscurations to omniscience.

original: gzhan rnams zhes pa gang rnams don dam par spyan drang ba la sogs pa srid pa na rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rigs pa bzhud pa la sogs pa'i spros pa la grol ba sgrib pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
analyzed: gzhan rnams zhes pa gang rnams don dam par spyan drang ba la sogs pa srid pa na rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rigs pa bzhud pa la sogs pa'i spros pa la grol ba sgrib pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
translated: The ‚Äúothers‚Äù are those who are not liberated from the elaborations of the ma·πá·∏çala of colored particles, such as inviting the ultimate and so on, and who are not the tathƒÅgatas without obscurations.

original: rnams yod do zhes 'dod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnams yod do zhes 'dod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not assert that there are other tathƒÅgatas.üîΩWhat is the valid cognition here?

original: 'di la tshad ma ci zhe na gsungs pa 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la tshad ma ci zhe na gsungs pa 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúHere . . .‚Äù

original: gang gi padmar dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ba shes rab ma ji lta bur zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gi padmar dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ba shes rab ma ji lta bur zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: What kind of wisdom consort‚Äôs lotus will become the ma·πá·∏çala?

original: lo bcu gnyis ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis ma zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúTwelve years old . . .‚Äù

original: zla ba bstan pa ni byang chub kyi sems bsags pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba bstan pa ni byang chub kyi sems bsags pa'o //
translated: The moon is the accumulation of bodhicitta.

original: mi g-yo ba zhes pa mi g-yo ba ste skyes pa gzhan la mi 'gro ba zhes pa'i bar ro //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba zhes pa mi g-yo ba ste skyes pa gzhan la mi 'gro ba zhes pa'i bar ro //
translated: ‚ÄúUnwavering‚Äù means unwavering, not going to another man.

original: 'di lta bu'i shes rab ma la dbul ba'i slob ma de rnams ni /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i shes rab ma la dbul ba'i slob ma de rnams ni /
translated: Those disciples who offer such wisdom to the mother

original: 'di rnams kho na zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'di rnams kho na zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: are ‚Äújust these,‚Äù those endowed with the qualities to be explained.

original: de nyid ni bzhi ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni bzhi ba'o //
translated: That itself is the fourth.

original: lnga zhes pa chu dang / cod pan dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming rnams so //
analyzed: lnga zhes pa chu dang / cod pan dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming rnams so //
translated: The ‚Äúfive‚Äù are the water, crown, vajra, master, and name initiations.

original: sngags dang / rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gsang ba rnams rig ma'i brtul zhugs dang bcas pa bdun no //
analyzed: sngags dang / rdo rje brtul zhugs dang / spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang / lung bstan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gsang ba rnams rig ma'i brtul zhugs dang bcas pa bdun no //

original: gnyis ni shes rab ye shes dang bzhi ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis ni shes rab ye shes dang bzhi ba'o //

translated: ‚ÄúCollected into one‚Äù means that if these are collected into one, there are fourteen initiations.

analyzed: de la chu la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i mthar thug pa ni slob dpon gyi dbang du brjod par bya'o //
translated: The final stage of the water and so forth is to be described from the perspective of the master initiation.

analyzed: de kho na nyid @196b rig ma'i brtul zhugs dang bcas pa ni phyi'o //

analyzed: gsang ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro //

analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid ni shes rab kyi dbang bskur ro //

analyzed: de kho na nyid ni dbang bskur bzhi pa'o // de ltar yang rig ma'i brtul zhugs slob dpon gyi dbang ngam /

original: shes rab kyi dbang bskur du de dang de'i yan lag nyid kyis nang du bsdus nas gsungs pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi dbang bskur du de dang de'i yan lag nyid kyis nang du bsdus nas gsungs pa /

analyzed: slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi ba de yang de bzhin no //

analyzed: zhes so // dbul bya zhes pa ni bla ma la slob mas gser la sogs pa'o //

original: bla mar zhes pa bla ma'o //
analyzed: bla mar zhes pa bla ma'o //

original: mi gsung pa ni ting nge 'dzin la phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: mi gsung pa ni ting nge 'dzin la phyogs pa'o //

original: 'di thams cad mtshon pa kho na ste /

analyzed: 'dir gdams ngag ni 'di yin te / 'dir slob dpon lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor ba'i dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid du dang / slob ma yang de ltar dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid du bsgoms nas 'khyud pa'i las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs sde ma'i gzugs can cho ga ji lta bar sbyangs pa'i padma'i sa'i dbus su rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis spyan drangs
translated: Here is the instruction:üîΩHere, the master visualizes himself as glorious Heruka surrounded by twenty-four goddesses, and the disciple also meditates on himself as glorious Heruka.üîΩHaving embraced the action seal in the form of VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´, as prescribed, in the center of the lotus ground, the BhagavƒÅn of twenty-five aspects is invited with a mass of light rays from the seed syllable in one's heart center.

translated: Having accomplished in an instant the mandala of the nature of mind with three stages and the twenty-five deities together with the mansion, the disciple makes five ma·πá·∏çalas.üîΩ‚ÄúProtector, I request

analyzed: slob ma'i mos pa yid kyis blta bya ste // zab cing rgya che'i tshul la mos pa la //

original: dbang bskur rin chen tshig nyid kyis sbyin bya //
analyzed: dbang bskur rin chen tshig nyid kyis sbyin bya //

original: zhes so // dbang bzhi ba'o zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes so // dbang bzhi ba'o zhes pa'o //

original: @199a * // gang slob ma dbang po 'bring po de la /
analyzed: @199a * // gang slob ma dbang po 'bring po de la /

original: phyi rol du bsgoms pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin la chos 'byung gi padma'i nang du dpag tshad bye pa'i tshad can yid kyi rang bzhin rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ji ltar rigs par brjod pa'i cho gas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol du bsgoms pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin la chos 'byung gi padma'i nang du dpag tshad bye pa'i tshad can yid kyi rang bzhin rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ji ltar rigs par brjod pa'i cho gas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: the wisdom-knowledge initiation, which is cultivated externally, is the mandala of the nature of mind, which is three leagues in size, with three stages, and is cultivated inside a lotus of the source of phenomena.

original: gang bsod nams bsags pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po 'di bskyed par nus pa'i bla mas sprul pa gsal bar mthong ba de ni dbang po mchog gi mchog yin te //
analyzed: gang bsod nams bsags pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po 'di bskyed par nus pa'i bla mas sprul pa gsal bar mthong ba de ni dbang po mchog gi mchog yin te //
translated: The guru who is able to generate these two mandalas of accumulated merit, and who clearly sees the emanation, is the supreme of the supreme faculties.

original: de la yang 'di ltar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang 'di ltar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: The initiation should be conferred upon him in the following way.

original: dbang po rtul po ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du'i //
analyzed: dbang po rtul po ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ram ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du'i //

original: de ltar gdams pa phye nas bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar gdams pa phye nas bya ste /
translated: The initiation should be conferred in that way after dividing the instructions.

original: gdams pa nyams pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdams pa nyams pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la dkyil 'khor gsungs nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la dkyil 'khor gsungs nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa'i ched du gsungs pa /

original: ci ru zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: ci ru zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Having taught the mandala of the creation stage, in order to teach the mandala of the completion stage, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúWhat? ‚Äù and so forth.

original: ci ru zhes pa don dam par rten 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: ci ru zhes pa don dam par rten 'gog pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú What? ‚Äù is the negation of a support ultimately.

original: ci zhig ces pa lha'i ngo bo'i brten pa 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: ci zhig ces pa lha'i ngo bo'i brten pa 'gog pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú What? ‚Äù is the negation of a support that is the nature of a deity.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa la sogs pa bsod nams sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub chen po'i lam yin mod kyi /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa la sogs pa bsod nams sgrub par byed pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub chen po'i lam yin mod kyi /

original: de ltar yang ring ba dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis stong pa'o zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang ring ba dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis stong pa'o zhes gsungs pa /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares that it is empty of the qualities of distance, superknowledge, and so forth.

original: lhung zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: lhung zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚Äú Falling, ‚Äù and so forth.

original: brdzun la zhes pa rnam par rtog pas sgro btags pa brdzun pa'i ngo bo la'o //
analyzed: brdzun la zhes pa rnam par rtog pas sgro btags pa brdzun pa'i ngo bo la'o //
translated: ‚Äú False‚Äù is the false nature imagined by conceptuality.

original: cal col zhes pa g-yeng ba rnam pa sna tshogs su myur du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub pa'i lam las grol ba'i 'gro ba lhung ngo zhes thugs brtse bar mdzad do //
analyzed: cal col zhes pa g-yeng ba rnam pa sna tshogs su myur du rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub pa'i lam las grol ba'i 'gro ba lhung ngo zhes thugs brtse bar mdzad do //
translated: The word nonsense means that the wandering beings fall from the path of quickly accomplishing perfect enlightenment into various kinds of distraction. [The Buddha] has compassion for them.

original: 'o na sgro ma btags pa ci zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na sgro ma btags pa ci zhe na gsungs pa /
translated: Now, what is the non-superimposition? It is stated:

original: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Empty and so forth.

original: mtha' dag ces pa phung po dang khams la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' dag ces pa phung po dang khams la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word all refers to the aggregates, elements, and so on.

original: de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni rdzogs pa'o /
analyzed: de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni rdzogs pa'o /
translated: Such a ma·πá·∏çala is perfect.

original: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa /

original: padma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: padma zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

original: bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i padma'i dbus su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i padma'i dbus su gnas pa'o //
translated: It abides in the center of the lotus of great bliss, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ma tshogs ni rtsa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma tshogs ni rtsa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The assembly of yoginƒ´s are of the nature of the channels.

original: ha ru ka ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: ha ru ka ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: Hara is the bodhicitta.

original: de kho na nyid ste bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa @199b rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rnag bzhin ni phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bor skye'i zhes gsungs pa //
analyzed: de kho na nyid ste bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa @199b rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang / sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rnag bzhin ni phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bor skye'i zhes gsungs pa //
translated: The reality, which is the nature of great bliss, is of one taste with emptiness, and has the nature of a dream, a reflection, an illusion, and so forth.

original: mtha' dag skyed byed ces pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' dag skyed byed ces pa'o //
translated: It is born in the nature of the aggregates and so forth.

original: de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor blang bar bya ba 'di bsgo mas la mthong bar gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor blang bar bya ba 'di bsgo mas la mthong bar gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Therefore, you should see this, which is to be taken as the perfect mandala, as being created by the mind.

original: de dril bu zhabs kyis gsungs pa /üîΩsems gnas las kyi thig dang ni //
analyzed: de dril bu zhabs kyis gsungs pa / sems gnas las kyi thig dang ni //
translated: This is stated by Ghantapa:üîΩThe creation of the mandalaüîΩarises from the ritual of the mental lines

analyzed: rdul tshon dgye ba'i rim las byung //

original: 'gro 'di dkyil 'khor kho na ste //
analyzed: 'gro 'di dkyil 'khor kho na ste //

original: rang bzhin gyis grub gnyis med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis grub gnyis med pa'o //

original: bcos ma gnyis kyi ngo bo gang //
analyzed: bcos ma gnyis kyi ngo bo gang //
translated: Whatever is the nature of the two fabricated ones

original: de ni gdul bya'i dbang las 'dod //
analyzed: de ni gdul bya'i dbang las 'dod //

original: de ni thar 'dod bsgrung bya min //
analyzed: de ni thar 'dod bsgrung bya min //

original: thar pa yang dag don mthong las //
analyzed: thar pa yang dag don mthong las //

original: zhes so // gal te rnam pa de ltar rdzogs pa yin na /
analyzed: zhes so // gal te rnam pa de ltar rdzogs pa yin na /

analyzed: 'o na de ni thams cad kyi tshe yod pa kho na ste /
translated: Well then, it exists at all times, so what is the use of meditation?

original: sgom pas kyang ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: sgom pas kyang ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /

analyzed: gnod pas te gnod pa ni phyin ci log pa ste /

analyzed: rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi phung po la sogs pa la rmongs pas so //
translated: By delusion about the aggregates, etc., which have the nature of a dream.üîΩTherefore, in dependence on the object to be adopted and the object to be abandoned, one should definitely analyze.

original: de'i phyir ltos te blang bya dang dor bya la rmongs pa la nges par dpyod cig / skyen par ni myur bar te ji srid du dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa yid brten du med pa 'di yid kyi bar du'o zhes sgom pa la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ltos te blang bya dang dor bya la rmongs pa la nges par dpyod cig / skyen par ni myur bar te ji srid du dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa yid brten du med pa 'di yid kyi bar du'o zhes sgom pa la sbyor ba'o //
translated: Quickly, that is, as long as this perfect endowment of leisure and opportunity is not lost, one should apply oneself to meditation.

analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u drug pa'o /

original: // / da ni 'bras bu'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyi sgom pa brjod pa'i ched du gdul bya'i skye bo'i ngor re zhig phyi'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
analyzed: // / da ni 'bras bu'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das kyi sgom pa brjod pa'i ched du gdul bya'i skye bo'i ngor re zhig phyi'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa /
translated: Now, in order to describe the meditation of the BhagavƒÅn, the continuum of the result, the external ma·πá·∏çala is taught for the time being from the perspective of the disciples.

original: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.

original: ri bo zhes pa la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: ri bo zhes pa la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: The mountain, etc., is literal.

original: zlum po zhes pa la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zlum po zhes pa la sogs pa la /

original: de la rim pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rim pa 'di yin te /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i cho ga ji lta bar yongs su sbyang pa'am //

original: lag pas reg nas sa sbyong ba'i sngags brgyad lhag pa'i brgya bzlas pas sbyang spar kho bos byas pa'i dus 'khor la 'jug par brjod pa'i rigs pas thar ma'i grib ma dang nya dag gis phyogs dang phyogs bral nges par byas nas lha'i sku can gtor ma byisüîΩla slob dpon gyis //
analyzed: lag pas reg nas sa sbyong ba'i sngags brgyad lhag pa'i brgya bzlas pas sbyang spar kho bos byas pa'i dus 'khor la 'jug par brjod pa'i rigs pas thar ma'i grib ma dang nya dag gis phyogs dang phyogs bral nges par byas nas lha'i sku can gtor ma byis la slob dpon gyis //
translated: Having ascertained the directions and intermediate directions with the shadow of a weapon and a tortoise, the master,

original: dang por shar du kha bltas par gyur nas //
analyzed: dang por shar du kha bltas par gyur nas //
translated: facing east at first,

original: so sor ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom sa ba'i skud pa nyi shu @200a * //
analyzed: so sor ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom sa ba'i skud pa nyi shu @200a * //
translated: should visualize the thread as the five tathƒÅgatas, each with the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses.

original: rtsa lnga bsgril ba slob dpon gyis nas tsam du sbom pa gsar ba ring bar dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur mtho gang lhag pa'i thig skud /
analyzed: rtsa lnga bsgril ba slob dpon gyis nas tsam du sbom pa gsar ba ring bar dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur mtho gang lhag pa'i thig skud /
translated: The master should roll the new thread, the thickness of a barley grain, twenty-five times, and the thread for the ma·πá·∏çala, twice the size of the ma·πá·∏çala, one cubit high, should be prepared.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis lte bar bzung bas /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis lte bar bzung bas /
translated: Holding the left vajra fist to the navel,

original: slob ma lha'i sku can dang / lhan cig tu ye shes kyi thig ces bya ba tshangs pa'i thig gnyis nam mkha' la btab nas /
analyzed: slob ma lha'i sku can dang / lhan cig tu ye shes kyi thig ces bya ba tshangs pa'i thig gnyis nam mkha' la btab nas /
translated: the disciple, who has the body of the deity, together with the master, having drawn the so-called gnosis line, the BrahmƒÅ line, in the sky,
