analyzed: 'og tu sa gzhi la tshangs pa'i thig de ltar drang por gdab bo //
translated: below, on the ground, the BrahmƒÅ line is drawn straight.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par 'grub pa'i ched du nya'i kha dang / mjug ma dag gi steng du tshangs thig gnyis pa byang du kha phyogs pas gdab bo //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par 'grub pa'i ched du nya'i kha dang / mjug ma dag gi steng du tshangs thig gnyis pa byang du kha phyogs pas gdab bo //
translated: Then, in order to make the ma·πá·∏çala square, the second BrahmƒÅ line is drawn above the mouth and the tail of the fish, facing north.

original: de nas zur thig gnyis pa cho ga ji lta bar gdab bo //
analyzed: de nas zur thig gnyis pa cho ga ji lta bar gdab bo //
translated: Then, the second corner line is drawn according to the rite.

original: de nas khru gang pa la sogs pa'i tshad can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig bzhi'o //
analyzed: de nas khru gang pa la sogs pa'i tshad can gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rtsa ba'i thig bzhi'o //
translated: Then, there are four root lines of the ma·πá·∏çala, one cubit, and so on, in size.

original: de nas tshangs thig gnyis kyi phyi rol du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'gro zhing /
analyzed: de nas tshangs thig gnyis kyi phyi rol du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su 'gro zhing /
translated: Then, outside the two BrahmƒÅ lines, one should go to the east, and so on, the directions.

original: rdul tshon gyi sa'i tshad kyis thig gcig dor nas thig bzhi'o //
analyzed: rdul tshon gyi sa'i tshad kyis thig gcig dor nas thig bzhi'o //
translated: Having abandoned one line according to the measure of the colored powder ground, there are four lines.

original: slar yang thig gcig go //
analyzed: slar yang thig gcig go //
translated: Again, there is one line.

original: de'i rjes su thig gnyis dor nas lha'i snam bu'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de'i rjes su thig gnyis dor nas lha'i snam bu'i thig gcig go //
translated: After that, having omitted two lines, one line of the god's platform.

original: de ltar tshangs thig nas bzung nas rtsa ba'i thig dang bcas pa thig bcu rnams longs gcig tu ste /
analyzed: de ltar tshangs thig nas bzung nas rtsa ba'i thig dang bcas pa thig bcu rnams longs gcig tu ste /
translated: Thus, beginning from the brahma line, the ten lines including the basic line are one set.

original: logs gzhan du yang rim pa di ltar ro //
analyzed: logs gzhan du yang rim pa di ltar ro //
translated: The other sides are in the same order.

original: de nas rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'i sgo bzhi cha'i tshad du rdul tshon gyi sa'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas rtsa ba'i thig las phyi rol du 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'i sgo bzhi cha'i tshad du rdul tshon gyi sa'i thig gcig go //
translated: Then, outside the basic line, one line of colored powder earth is the measure of one-eighth of the wheel and one-fourth of the door.

original: de nas sgo'i phyed kyi tshad du lha'i stegs bu'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas sgo'i phyed kyi tshad du lha'i stegs bu'i thig gcig go //
translated: Then, the measure of half the door is one line of the god's platform.

original: de nas tshon gyi sa'i tshad kyis rin chen snam bu'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas tshon gyi sa'i tshad kyis rin chen snam bu'i thig gcig go //
translated: Then, the measure of the colored powder earth is one line of the jewel ledge.

original: de nas nam bu'i tshad du dra ba dang da ba phyed pa'i snam bu'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas nam bu'i tshad du dra ba dang da ba phyed pa'i snam bu'i thig gcig go //
translated: Then, the measure of the space is one line of the half-vajra and half-net ledge.

original: de nas chos kyi sa'i tshad kyis ba ku l'i'i snam bu'i'am //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi sa'i tshad kyis ba ku l'i'i snam bu'i'am //
translated: Then, the measure of the dharma earth is one line of the bakula ledge.

original: kha cig gi lugs la slar yang rin chen snam bu'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: kha cig gi lugs la slar yang rin chen snam bu'i thig gcig go //

original: de nas mun pa'i snam bu'i thig thung ba gcig ste /
analyzed: de nas mun pa'i snam bu'i thig thung ba gcig ste /
translated: Then, one short line of the band of darkness.

original: de kho na la mda' yab rnams so //
analyzed: de kho na la mda' yab rnams so //

original: de nas dbyi ba'i ngal bas 'jigs pas thig thung gis sam ring pos kyang rung ste /
analyzed: de nas dbyi ba'i ngal bas 'jigs pas thig thung gis sam ring pos kyang rung ste /
translated: Then, for fear of the fatigue of the birds, with a short line or even a long line,

original: sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs kyi thig bzhi'o //
analyzed: sgo las sum 'gyur rta babs kyi thig bzhi'o //
translated: four lines of the pediment, three times the door.

original: de nas thig gnyis dor nas rta babs dang 'brel ba'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas thig gnyis dor nas rta babs dang 'brel ba'i thig gcig go //

original: de nas thig gsum dor nas dril bu dang bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan dang / rgyal @200b mtshan dang / gdugs dang / dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa'i gnas kyi thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas thig gsum dor nas dril bu dang bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan dang / rgyal @200b mtshan dang / gdugs dang / dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa'i gnas kyi thig gcig go //
translated: Then, having skipped three lines, one line of the place of the bell, the flag moved by the wind, the banner, the parasol, the wish-fulfilling tree, and so on.

original: slar yang thig gcig dor nas thig gcig go //
analyzed: slar yang thig gcig dor nas thig gcig go //
translated: Again, having skipped one line, one line.

original: de nas padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
translated: Then, one line of the garland of lotus petals.

original: de nyid kyi phyir padma'i lte ba'i nang du gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la khang ba brtsegs pa gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir padma'i lte ba'i nang du gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la khang ba brtsegs pa gnas pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, the center of the multi-colored vajra located in the center of the lotus is the location of the multi-storied building.

original: lte ba de'i phyi rol padma'i lte ba la ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra dang rta babs la sogs pa bri'o //
analyzed: lte ba de'i phyi rol padma'i lte ba la ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra dang rta babs la sogs pa bri'o //
translated: Outside the center of that, on the center of the lotus, one should draw the knot of the vajra cross and the archway, etc.

original: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
translated: Then, one line of the vajra garland.

original: de nas thig gnyis dor nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
analyzed: de nas thig gnyis dor nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i thig gcig go //
translated: Then, having skipped two lines, one line of the garland of light rays.

original: padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba med do zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: padma'i 'dab ma'i phreng ba med do zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say that there is no garland of lotus petals.

original: kong ka na ni rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i thig bzhi rnams so zhes smra'o //
analyzed: kong ka na ni rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i thig bzhi rnams so zhes smra'o //
translated: In the Konkana, there are four lines of the vajra, wheel, and garland of light rays.

original: de ltar tshon gyi sa'i thig nas brtsam te thig bcu drug rnams ngos gcig tu'o //
analyzed: de ltar tshon gyi sa'i thig nas brtsam te thig bcu drug rnams ngos gcig tu'o //
translated: Thus, beginning from the line of the ground of the colors, the sixteen lines are on one side.

original: de ltar ngos gzhan du yang ngo zhes pa thig nyi shu rtsa drug rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de ltar ngos gzhan du yang ngo zhes pa thig nyi shu rtsa drug rim pa gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor du gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: Thus, on the other side as well, thus the twenty-six lines are the rite of drawing the lines of the second-stage mandala.

original: phogs 'di kho nas rim pa gsum pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du thig gdab par ba'o //
analyzed: phogs 'di kho nas rim pa gsum pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du thig gdab par ba'o //
translated: By this very method, one should draw the lines of the third-stage mandala, etc.

original: de ltar gcig gi tshe thig btab pas //
analyzed: de ltar gcig gi tshe thig btab pas //
translated: Thus, when one line is drawn,

original: dgu dang / bcu gsum dang / bco lnga dang / bcu dgu dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / sum cu rtsa bdun dang / ji srid du 'bum la sogs pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par shes par ba'o //
analyzed: dgu dang / bcu gsum dang / bco lnga dang / bcu dgu dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / sum cu rtsa bdun dang / ji srid du 'bum la sogs pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par shes par ba'o //
translated: nine, thirteen, fifteen, nineteen, thirty-two, thirty-seven, and as many as one hundred thousand, and so forth.

original: 'dir rta babs la sogs pa rnams su nang gi thig gi khyad par dang / sa spyang pa la sogs pa dang / dbyi ba dang / tshon dgye ba la sogs pa rgyas par kho bo cag gis dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bshad do //
analyzed: 'dir rta babs la sogs pa rnams su nang gi thig gi khyad par dang / sa spyang pa la sogs pa dang / dbyi ba dang / tshon dgye ba la sogs pa rgyas par kho bo cag gis dkyil 'khor gyi cho gar bshad do //
translated: Here, the distinctions of the inner lines, the purification of the ground, and the spreading of the sand, and the application of the colors, and so forth, in the pediments and so forth, are explained in our mandala ritual in detail.

original: rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor //
translated: Surrounded by the three vajras.

original: zhes pa sngon po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i rdo rje'i phreng ba gsum rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa sngon po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i rdo rje'i phreng ba gsum rnams kyis bskor ba'o //
translated: It is surrounded by three vajra garlands, blue, red, and white.

original: yud kyis zhes pa h'um yig gcig kho na las rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das te nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yud kyis zhes pa h'um yig gcig kho na las rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das te nyi shu rtsa lnga bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In an instant, because the yoginƒ´s and the Lord are generated from just one syllable h≈´·πÉ.

original: de ru phyung ba zhes pa bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i dus su h'um yig las so //
analyzed: de ru phyung ba zhes pa bcom ldan 'das bskyed pa'i dus su h'um yig las so //
translated: The emergence is from the syllable H≈™M at the time of generating the Bhagavat.

original: kha dog lnga'i rnam brgyan pa ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro //üîΩh'um yig bdag nyid ni h'um yig las skyes pa'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad do //
analyzed: kha dog lnga'i rnam brgyan pa ni rten gyi dkyil 'khor ro // h'um yig bdag nyid ni h'um yig las skyes pa'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de la de skad do //
translated: The adorned with the five colors is the supporting mandala.

original: nag @201a * //üîΩdang dkar mo ljang gu rnams //
analyzed: nag @201a * // dang dkar mo ljang gu rnams //
translated: The having the nature of the syllable H≈™M is that which has the nature of being born from the syllable H≈™M.

original: zhes pa / dbus ma dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum par gnas pa rnams go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa / dbus ma dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum par gnas pa rnams go rims bzhin no //
translated: The black, white, and green are the middle, second, and third [faces], respectively.

original: sgo skyong ma rnams ni nag po ste rim pa dbus mar gnas pa ltar ro //üîΩmi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
analyzed: sgo skyong ma rnams ni nag po ste rim pa dbus mar gnas pa ltar ro // mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
translated: The gatekeepers are black are in the middle row, as before.

original: zhes pa dbus na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa gtso bo nyid kyis gsungs pa ste gsungs pa yang sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can gyis brgyan pa zhes so //
analyzed: zhes pa dbus na gnas pa'i mi bskyod pa gtso bo nyid kyis gsungs pa ste gsungs pa yang sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can gyis brgyan pa zhes so //
translated: The having the crown of Ak·π£obhya is the middle one, the principal one, who is said to be adorned with the crowns of the five buddhas.

original: rnal 'byor ma kun zhes pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kun zhes pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
translated: The all yoginƒ´s are the twenty-five.

original: de'i gzugs zhes pa ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dbu la rgyan btags pa de ltar de rnams kyang rgyas btab pa ste /
analyzed: de'i gzugs zhes pa ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dbu la rgyan btags pa de ltar de rnams kyang rgyas btab pa ste /
translated: His form is like the ornaments placed on the head of the Lord, and so they are sealed.

original: 'on kyang de rnams kyi spyi bor gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo so so yin no zhes gsungs pa gtso bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang de rnams kyi spyi bor gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo so so yin no zhes gsungs pa gtso bo zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: However, it is said that the principal one is the Tathagata who resides on the head of each of them.

original: 'dod par bya ste 'dod du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod par bya ste 'dod du 'jug pa'o //
translated: One should desire, that is, one should enter into desire.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni phreng bzangs ma la sogs pa bzhi rnams so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams ni phreng bzangs ma la sogs pa bzhi rnams so //
translated: The yoginis are the four, namely, Suvarcal etc.

original: bla ma kha cig sgo skyong ma rnams so zhes so //
analyzed: bla ma kha cig sgo skyong ma rnams so zhes so //
translated: Some gurus say that they are the door-guardians.

original: sgyid lug gyur pa ni gzhan gyi ngor sgyid lug par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: sgyid lug gyur pa ni gzhan gyi ngor sgyid lug par gyur pa ste /
translated: Discouraged means discouraged by others.

original: stong pa nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the ultimate of emptiness alone.

original: mig ces pa 'gro ba 'don par dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mig ces pa 'gro ba 'don par dam bcas pa'o //
translated: Eye means the vow to deliver the world.

original: dran byed ni dran par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dran byed ni dran par byed pa'o //
translated: Reminder means the one who reminds.

original: bdag po kye ni mtha' dag gi bdag po'o //
analyzed: bdag po kye ni mtha' dag gi bdag po'o //
translated: The lord, O, is the lord of all.

original: bya ba zhes pa rang gi don tsam byas nas so //
analyzed: bya ba zhes pa rang gi don tsam byas nas so //
translated: Action means having done one's own purpose.

original: bdag po sngon zhes pa la sogs pa bdag pos sngon ji ltar dam bcas pa dran par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: bdag po sngon zhes pa la sogs pa bdag pos sngon ji ltar dam bcas pa dran par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The master is the one who has made the vow, and so on.

original: sgyid lug ni sgyid lug pa ste 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nye bar gtses pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: sgyid lug ni sgyid lug pa ste 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nye bar gtses pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The discouraged are those who are discouraged, because they are oppressed by the suffering of cyclic existence.

original: log pa ni log par yongs su brtags pa la ste dngos po'i mtha' dang dngos po med pa'i mthar ro //
analyzed: log pa ni log par yongs su brtags pa la ste dngos po'i mtha' dang dngos po med pa'i mthar ro //
translated: The perverted are those who are perverted in their imagination, in the extremes of existence and nonexistence.

original: nga rgyal zhes pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo //
analyzed: nga rgyal zhes pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo //
translated: The conceited are those who are conceited.

original: dges pa zhes pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dges pa zhes pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The delighted are those who are attached.

original: de ltar dngos por 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar dngos por 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
translated: Thus, it is said, they will grasp at things.

original: mthong zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: mthong zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Seeing, and so on,

original: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs la 'dod pa yis stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen po 'byung ba las dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par mchog tu 'dzin pa zad par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs la 'dod pa yis stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i bde ba chen po 'byung ba las dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par mchog tu 'dzin pa zad par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
translated: means that from the arising of the bliss that is one taste with emptiness in the desire for the assembly of yoginis, the grasping at things and nonthings, and so on, will be exhausted. This is the meaning.

original: sngon bzhin zhal dang phyag mtshan sogs //
analyzed: sngon bzhin zhal dang phyag mtshan sogs //
translated: As before, the faces, hand implements, and so on,

original: zhes pa rgyu rdo rje 'chang bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes pa rgyu rdo rje 'chang bzhin no //
translated: This is like the causal Vajradhara.üîΩAs for the color, it is blue, as stated in other tantras:

original: sku mdog ni 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang gi nag po rgyu rdo rje 'chang ga dkar po'i zhes rgyud gzhan du'o //
analyzed: sku mdog ni 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang gi nag po rgyu rdo rje 'chang ga dkar po'i zhes rgyud gzhan du'o //
translated: The color of the result Vajradhara is black, and the color of the causal Vajradhara is white.

original: @201b 'dir ni sngon po kho na'o //
analyzed: @201b 'dir ni sngon po kho na'o //
translated: Here, however, it is blue.

original: kha cig tu sngon bzhin sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs zhes klog ste /
analyzed: kha cig tu sngon bzhin sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs zhes klog ste /
translated: Some read this as ‚Äúthe color, hand implements, and so on are the same as before.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa yang sngon po'o zhes gsal lo //
analyzed: de'i tshe rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa yang sngon po'o zhes gsal lo //
translated: In that case, it is clear that the causal Vajradhara is also blue.

original: bzhengs so zhes pa ni sna tshogs sde ma dang bcas pa'o //üîΩ'o na me long ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs par yongs su gyur pa ni rgyu rdo rje 'dzin par gdams pa de ltar 'di yang ji ltar min zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: bzhengs so zhes pa ni sna tshogs sde ma dang bcas pa'o // 'o na me long ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs par yongs su gyur pa ni rgyu rdo rje 'dzin par gdams pa de ltar 'di yang ji ltar min zhe na ma yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúArises‚Äù means together with the Cakrasa·πÉvara.

original: zhu ba las byung ba'i h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'i h'um yig las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhu ba las byung ba'i h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'i h'um yig las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Well then, if the causal Vajradhara is the transformation of the moon, sun, and so on, which are the nature of the mirrorlike gnosis and so on, then how is this not the case here? It is not the case, because the causal Vajradhara arises from the syllable h≈´·πÉ that arises from the melting and from the syllable h≈´·πÉ that arises from the vajra.

original: de'i 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin nam zhe na /
translated: What is the result of that? The nature of the five exalted wisdoms of a vajra holder.

original: de ltar ma yin te shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams de'i ngo bor skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin te shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams de'i ngo bor skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not like that, because those who are very pure are born in the nature of that.

original: de ltar na gang du 'gro ba thams cad me long la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa so sor snang ba de me long ye shes so //
analyzed: de ltar na gang du 'gro ba thams cad me long la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan du gyur pa so sor snang ba de me long ye shes so //
translated: Thus, the mirror-like exalted wisdom is that into which all migrating beings go, appearing as reflections in a mirror.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni gang gis de ltar gzugs brnyan du gyur ba'i 'gro ba mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni gang gis de ltar gzugs brnyan du gyur ba'i 'gro ba mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'o //
translated: The exalted wisdom of equality is that by which migrating beings who have become like reflections are realized to be equal.

original: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni gang gis de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa kho nas sems can rnams thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams so sor rtog pa'o //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni gang gis de ltar mnyam par gzhag pa kho nas sems can rnams thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams so sor rtog pa'o //
translated: The individually discriminating exalted wisdom is that by which the mental behaviors of all sentient beings are individually discriminated by means of meditative equipoise.

original: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni gang gis de ltar so sor brtags pa'i 'gro ba'i bya ba'i rjes su sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni gang gis de ltar so sor brtags pa'i 'gro ba'i bya ba'i rjes su sgrub pa'o //
translated: The exalted wisdom that accomplishes activities is that by which the activities of migrating beings are accomplished in accordance with those individually discriminated.

original: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni gang bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa gnyis las grol ba bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin snying rje dang shes rab gnyis su med pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes ni gang bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa gnyis las grol ba bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin snying rje dang shes rab gnyis su med pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The gnosis of the utterly pure expanse of reality is the perfection of the realization of the expanse of reality, which is the nature of great bliss, the nonduality of compassion and wisdom, free from the two obscurations together with habitual tendencies.

original: de nas 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas 'bras bu rdo rje 'dzin pa yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Then, the result, the vajra holder, is also the nature of the five gnoses.

original: ye shes 'di rnams ni las dang po bas lhag par mos pas sgom par byed de /
analyzed: ye shes 'di rnams ni las dang po bas lhag par mos pas sgom par byed de /
translated: These gnoses are cultivated by the beginner through imagination.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid shin tu dang ba zla ba'i tshul can kho na ni me long dang zla ba dang nyi ma 'dus pa na bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi yid kyis chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid du yang tha dad pa
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid shin tu dang ba zla ba'i tshul can kho na ni me long dang zla ba dang nyi ma 'dus pa na bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi yid kyis chos rnams thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid du yang tha dad pa
translated: The mind of all migrating beings, which is the nature of great bliss, is the mind that is the nature of great bliss, which is the very nature of the moon, when the mirror, the moon, and the sun are combined.

original: mi mthong ba'i phyir dang / 'gro ba'i don la nges par rtog pa lhur len pa dang / sprul pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis de'i don byed pa de ltar gsal bar gyur ba'o zhes pa bsam pa 'di rnams kyis so //
analyzed: mi mthong ba'i phyir dang / 'gro ba'i don la nges par rtog pa lhur len pa dang / sprul pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis de'i don byed pa de ltar gsal bar gyur ba'o zhes pa bsam pa 'di rnams kyis so //
translated: Because of not seeing, and because of being intent on definitely conceiving the purpose of migrating beings, and because of accomplishing that purpose with immeasurable emanations, it is clear in that way.

analyzed: rdzogs pa ni de'i don nges par sems pas goms par @202a * //
translated: Perfection is the definite conception of that purpose, and the cultivation of familiarity.

original: byed do zhes pa mang pos chog go //
analyzed: byed do zhes pa mang pos chog go //

original: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas nas /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um zhes pa gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas nas /
translated: or ‚Äúo·πÉ ƒÅ·∏• h≈´·πÉ,‚Äù and having protected the place, himself, and the yoga,

analyzed: ngur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la rdo rje skyil krung gis 'dug pa shes rab dang bcas pa'am /

analyzed: phreng bzangs ma la sogs pa rdo rje rol pa mo nyi shu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor ba /

analyzed: bdag nyid la zhal phyogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la sogs pa can mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la /
